GK16ruyalscu:347: taṃ dṛṣṭvā karaṇairananyaviṣayairantarvilīno 'bhavaṃ yāvattāvadahaṃ cirādupacitaiḥ pāpaiḥ prabodhaṃ gataḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:348: yathā ca - saṃsārārtyā vidhuravidhuro brahma yatnādvicinvan nānārūpaṃ jagadidamahaṃ dṛṣṭavāneva pūrvam /
GK16ruyalscu:349: haste nyaste sati tava guro sāṃprataṃ mastake 'smim brahmaivaitatsakalamabhavanno jagannāpi cāham //
GK16ruyalscu:350: yathā ca - kāṣṭhāprātpiriyaṃ parā khalu parīpākasya bhāgyonnateḥ śrī ballāla nṛpāla!yadvayamiṃmau pādau tavopāsmahe /
GK16ruyalscu:351: yastiṣṭhetpratihāra sīmni bhavato ruddhapraveśaściraṃ kiṃ nāsāvapi colapāṇḍyapṛthvīpālaiḥsamaṃ gaṇyate //
GK16ruyalscu:359: bhāvābhāso yathā - kvaṇādūdvirephāvalinīlaṅkaṇāṃ prasāryaṃ śākhābhujamāmra vallarī /
GK16ruyalscu:362: bhāvodayo yathā - kelitalpagatamaṅghriyāvakaṃ, sūcayatyuṣasi cakṣuṣā priye /
GK16ruyalscu:363: bhū[bhrū] tribhāgamupakalpya bhaṅguraṃ, gūḍha hāsa madhuraṃ cukopa sā //
GK16ruyalscu:365: bhāvasandhiryathā - netre jihyakharāruṇe kṣaṇāmatha vyāmīlyamānekṣaṇāṃ hastaṃ vyagragamāganaṃ kṣaṇāmatho dante śayānaṃ kṣaṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:366: sañcāraṃ viṣamākulaṃ kṣaṇamatha prakrāntalīlaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dhatte totriṣu ṣaṭpadeṣu ca samaṃ dattāvadhāno gajaḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:367: atra gajasya madākulasya yadetatkṣaṇamātraṃ netrayoḥ jihyākharā ruṇāyoḥ dharaṇāṃ samanantarameva yaccaitadūvyāmīlanaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:368: tathā haste ca yatkṣaṇāmatraṃ vyagro gamāgamaḥ yacca samanantarameva dante śayanaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:371_0: tadetat vividhaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ viceṣṭitadvayaṃ udbhavābhibhavadharmitayā kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇāmāvirbhavat
GK16ruyalscu:371_1: totriviṣayaṃ roṣaṃ ṣaṭpadaśabdalakṣitaṣaṭpadagītaviṣayaṃ harṣa ca parasparasyādattā
GK16ruyalscu:372_0: dvandva vṛttiṣu ca triṣvapi vākyeṣu pratisvaṃ kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇamityupādānādyathā yathā
GK16ruyalscu:373: dhatta iti vartamānanirdeśena prārabdhāparisamātpabhāvādekatarasyāṃ koṭāvaniṣṭheti dyotyate /
GK16ruyalscu:375: totriṣuṣaṭpadeṣu ca tulitamavadhānadānaṃ tadapyeka tarasyāṃ koṭā vaniṣṭāmeva vyanakti /
GK16ruyalscu:377: bhāvaśabalatā yathā - madhyesakhījanamupahvaravṛttajātaṃ vācā prakāśayati mayyupadeśavṛttyā /
GK16ruyalscu:378: sāsūyasapraṇāyasatrapa saprasādaiḥ sā māṃ vilokitavatī caṭulaiḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:381: bhāvaśāntiryathā tau saṃmukhapracalitau savidhe guruṇāṃ mārgapradānarabhasaskhalitāvadhānau /
GK16ruyalscu:386: atha saṃlakṣyakrame śabdaśaktimūlo 'laṅkārarūpo vasturūpaśca niyamena bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:387: tatrālaṅkārarūpo yathā - prāpyādharadvayadhurāṃ paricumbatīva līlottaraṃ vilikhatīva nakhatvametya /
GK16ruyalscu:388: tasyāḥ kaṭākṣavalanaṃ gurusannidhau māmāśrliṣyatīva samavāpya ca bāhubhāvam //
GK16ruyalscu:389: atrotprekṣālaṅkāreṇa cumbanādikāraṇā bhāve 'pi saṃbhogasukhā vātpilakṣaṇākāryotpattirūpā vibhāvanā vyajyate /
GK16ruyalscu:392: saṃsparśaṃ ca na tasya vetyupacitastambhaṃ mamaitadvapuḥ saṃvṛttaḥsakhi saṅgamo 'pi virahaprāyo vidhātāsmi kim //
GK16ruyalscu:393: atra vastuni avastutvabhramāt maugdhyalakṣaṇaṃ vastu pratyāyyate /
GK16ruyalscu:395: sa cālaṅkārarūpo vasturūpaśceti pratyekaṃ dvaividhye ṣoḍhā /
GK16ruyalscu:397: tathā hi - svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā vastu svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā alaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:398: svataḥsaṃbhavinālaṅkāroṇa vastu, tena alaṅkāra iti caturdhā /
GK16ruyalscu:400: tenālaṅkāraḥ kaviprauḍhoktiniṣpāditena alaṅkāreṇa vastu tena alaṅkāraḥ ityapi caturdhā /
GK16ruyalscu:402: atra prapañcaḥ saṃpradāyaprakāśinyāṃ kāvyaprakāśaṭokāyāṃ asmābhiḥ vitatyopa darśita iti tato 'vadhāryaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:403: iha tu granthagauravabhayāt prastāvānupayogācca na pratanyate /
GK16ruyalscu:404: diṅmātrantūdāhliyate- tatra svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā vastu yathā - adyāpi loke na kavirna so 'sti prācāṃ tulāṃ yaḥ prabalo 'dhiroḍhum /
GK16ruyalscu:405: purātano nāyamitīya deva tathāpi nindā yadi kiṃ karotu //
GK16ruyalscu:406: atra svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā aham evaṃvidha iti vaktuḥ svamāhātmyaprakhyāpanalakṣaghaṇaṃ vastu pratyāyyate //
GK16ruyalscu:407: kavinibaddhenālaṅkāreṇa vastu yathā - dṛṣṭirniṣṭhura baddhasārakhadirāṅgāra sphuliṅgopamā jihve sajjanatarjanolbaṇābalatkālāṅgulīcañcale /
GK16ruyalscu:409: kūrānukāraḥsakhe jaṅghe dve yadi tebhujaṅgabhuvanaṃ valmīkaśeṣaṃ bhavet //
GK16ruyalscu:410: atra kaviprauḍhoktiniṣpāditena aprastutapraśaṃsālaṅkāreṇa vidhivihitamanāryāṇāṃ kvicidaṃśe daurbalyaṃ viśvamabhirakṣatīti vastu /
GK16ruyalscu:416: kavinibaddhāyāḥ svairiṇyāḥ prauḍhoktiniṣpāditena rūpakālaṅkāreṇa upagūhanādinivāraṇāśālibhyo 'sya bāndhavamaraṇamahotsavasya atiśayapratyāyanātmā vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ pratyāyyate /
GK16ruyalscu:421: sandigdhaprādhānyaṃ tulyaprādhānyaṃ kākkākṣitpa masundaratvam iti vācyāṅgatvādayo bhedāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:424: tatra vācyāṅgatvaṃ yathā - śūnye tvadripurājadhāmni sudṛśāṃ citrārpitā nāṃ karaṃ saṃllāpaspṛhayā patannapi muhuḥ kīraḥsamārohati /
GK16ruyalscu:425: śrīballālanṛpāla! śiñjitarasānmañjīrarekhāmukhaṃ cañcvagreṇa ca hanta haṃsapṛthukaḥsañcālayankrandati //
GK16ruyalscu:426: atra śūnyīkṛtaripurājaveśmā nāyakaprabhāvātiśayaḥ pratīyamāno 'pi śukahaṃsavṛttāntopapādakatvena sthita iti vācyāṅgatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:428: itthaṃ dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoḥ kāvyayoḥsvarūpamupodgadhātatvena yathāyogamupanyasya prakaraṇā pratipipādayiṣitaṃ citrākhyaṃ kāvyamadhikīrṣurāha-citraṃ tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:431: ihārthapaunaruktyaṃ śabdapaunaruktyaṃ śabdārthapaunaruktyaṃ ceti trayaḥ paunaruktyaprakārāḥ // RuAss_1 //
GK16ruyalscu:432: nanu citramityupakramya paunaruktyaprakārakathane kā saṅgatiḥ ityata āha ādau paunakuktyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:433_1: kakṣyāvibhāgaṃ ghaṭayituṃ kakṣyāvibhāgasyaiva ca sphuṭīkārāya pratyekaṃ paunaruktyagrahaṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:437: nanu śabdapratītipūrvakatvādarthapratīteḥ prathamaṃ arthapaunaruktyanirdeśo na yujyata ityata āha-arthāpekṣayetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:438: antaraṅgatvaṃ prāthamikatvaṃ, arthagatanirdeśaḥ arthaviṣayaka paunaruktya nirdeśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:441: nirdiṣṭasya ca paunaruktyatrayasya sampabratipannatāmabhisandhāyāha-śābde prasthāna ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:443: nanu traya evetisamāptyarthatā kiṃ neṣyata ityata āha-triśabdādevetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:446: triśabdāttu parisamātpiḥsiddhā, 'siddhe satyārambho niyamāya' iti nyāyāt /
GK16ruyalscu:448: na ca mantavyaṃ sati prakāraśabde paunaruktyaṃ prasajediti /
GK16ruyalscu:449: prakāraśabdo hi paunaruktyaprakāramābaha-sa ca paunaruktyaprakāraḥ kena prakāreṇa triprakāra iti jijñāsāyām itiśabdaḥ tatprakāra vacana iti sarvamavadātam /
GK16ruyalscu:457: upādeye pratiyegyantare prasṛtāyāḥ pratipattṝ pratīteḥ avyākṣepāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:460: bhāvānayane dravyānayanamiha anusartavyaṃ nirdhārite paunaruktyatraya ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:463: yacchravaṇasamanantaraṃ yathāvadavabhātaṃ tattathaiva cetpratītiḥviśrāntyantaṃ nirbādham avatiṣṭheta sa praroha ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:468: nanu lakṣyapade punaruktavadābhāsa iti svarūpaprādhānyena nirdeśo nyāyyaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:469: na tu punaruktavadābhāsamiti kāvyaparatantratayā ityata āha-lakṣyanirdeśa ityādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:478: paryavasāneṣu ahīnasya mahato bhujaṅgādhīśasya vapurvalayaṃ kaṅkaṇamasyetyanyathātvam /
GK16ruyalscu:479: itthaṃ śilāderapatyaṃ śailādiḥ śailādeḥ nandina iva caritamasyeti,
GK16ruyalscu:481: tayā kṣataḥ kandarpo darpaśceti, kṣataḥ kandarpadarpo yeneti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:482: tathā vṛṣaḥ puṃrūpo gauśceti, vṛṣaḥśreṣṭha iti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:483: tathā śikhī pāvakaśca locane yasyeti ca śikhipāvakalocana iti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:484: tathā sarvamaṅgalāsahitaḥ pārvatīśa iti ca sarvairmaṅgalaismahitaśteti paunaruktyaṃ cāmukhābhāsanaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:486: atha vyastatayā samāsāntarāyaśrayatayā ca darśiyitumudāharaṇāntaraṃ-dāruṇa iti /
GK16ruyalscu:489: itthaṃ bhasma ca bhūtiśceti bhasmavano 'bhivṛddiriti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:490: tathā raktaṃ ca śoṇāṃ ceti ca rudhiravacchreṇamiti cāvagantavyamṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:493: kuṇḍalī sarpo bhujaṅgaśca kuṇḍalī ceti bhujaṅgakuṇḍalavāniti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:495: śaṃ śivaḥ śubhraiḥ aṃśubhiḥ śītaṃ cakṣurindriyamiti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:496: haraḥśiva iti ceto hara iti ca yojanīyam /
GK16ruyalscu:498: pāyādavyācceti tu tiṅantāpekṣayā ita ityapāyaviśeṣaṇatvena paryavasāne pañcamyantatayā pāyādavyādityanyathātvam /
GK16ruyalscu:503: atrādyaṃ padamuddeśyaṃ caramaṃ tu dvayaṃ vidheyam /
GK16ruyalscu:505: nanu kevalasvarapaunaruktyasya kiṃ vṛttamityata āha-alaṅkāraprastāva ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:506: alaṅkāro hi vicchrittiḥ, tatprastāve kevalasvarapaunaruktyama cārutvāt na gaṇanāmarhatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:516: nanu sāyaṃ kāyamityatra ko 'laṅkāra ityata āha-atra sāyaṃ śabdetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:519: itthaṃ ca sati sāyaṃ śabde dvayorekābhidhānalakṣaṇāḥsaṅkaraḥ abhidhatta ityabhidhānaṃ vācaka śabdaḥ ekavācakānupraveśalakṣaṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:529: śṛṅgārādirasaviṣayo yo 'yaṃ pratiniyamabhājāṃ varṇānāṃ vyañjanavyāpāraḥ sa vṛttirucyate /
GK16ruyalscu:530: so 'yaṃ varṇavyāpāro 'smin varṇāracanātmake kavivyāpāre 'stītyupacāreṇa varṇaracanāvṛttirityāha-tadvatī punarityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:538: yāvatā śabdālaṅkāreṣvapi yo bahiraṅgo vṛttyanuprāsātmā varṇālaṅkāraḥ taddharmatvāt tacchreṣabhūtā etā ityalamaprāsaṅgikavaidaddhya pravacanena /
GK16ruyalscu:544: sitāsitaruceḥ uttaralatārakatvāt anavasthitavarṇasanniveśāḥ sācīkṛtāḥ apāṅgānnirgantum ivehamānāḥsālasā rasānuśayaṃ nivartamānāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:546: sākūtā bhavatu paśyāma itīva vyāharantyaḥ sarasāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:547: raso rāge viṣe vīrye tiktādau pārade drave /
GK16ruyalscu:548: roṣāruṇimnā viṣayaṃ viṃliṃpantyaḥ mānānuvidvāḥ dṛṣṭaśrutādyaparādhajanmā roṣomānastena saṃmūrcchitāḥ jvalatkalpā ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:552: yadyapi kavervāṇī prabalena śabdāḍambareṇa khelantī prārambhe prathate,
GK16ruyalscu:553_0: tathāpi satāṃ mānorañjanaṃ na kurute amandaiḥ sundaraiśca guṇālaṅkāraiḥ mukharīkṛtaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:553_1: saniṣpandaṃ vilasadrasāyana rasā sārānusārī śṛṅgārādiko raso yāvanna syādityatra
GK16ruyalscu:554: bhphaṅkāritetyādāvekadhā samudāyasādṛśyaṃ rasāyana rasetyatra tu raseti samudāyatrayasya parasparasādṛśyamityanusandheyam /
GK16ruyalscu:555: tathā ca “āṭope” tyādau gauḍīyā “amandasundare” tyādau vaidarbhī,
GK16ruyalscu:558: so 'nuprāsaḥsa ca cheka vṛttyu pādhiva śādrūdvidhā //
GK16ruyalscu:569: svaravyañjanātmakasya śabdasamudāyasya yattenaiva rūpeṇa punarvacanaṃ tadyamanādyamakam /
GK16ruyalscu:572: kintu sarveṣāmevaiṣāṃ bhedānāmetadvaicitryatrayam āvahatīti abhiprāyeṇāha-atra kacidbhinnārthetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:577: rucire ramye vanajāyate padmadalavat dīrghe tasyāḥ netre yo yaḥ paśyayati,
GK16ruyalscu:579: idaṃ dvayoḥsārthakatve anarthakatve dvairūpye yathā- tvaṃ rāvaṇa! jagatpuṇyairlaṅkālaṅkārabhūrabhūḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:583: itthamarthapaunaruktye punaruktavadābhāsaṃ śabdapaunaruktye tu anuprāsayamakālaṅkārau ca vivecitau /
GK16ruyalscu:590: śabdasyārthasya ca punarvacanamanuvādādatirikte viṣaye doṣaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:593: yatra paunaruktye śabdārthau tāveva, tātparyamātraṃ tvanyat /
GK16ruyalscu:597: tadā jāyante guṇāḥ yadā te sahṛdayairgṛhyante /
GK16ruyalscu:599: atra dvitīyayorguṇa kamalaśabdayoḥ ślāghādyā śrayatvaṃ tātparyabhedaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:609: itthaṃ ca sati padanubandhanatayā prātipadika mātranibandhanatayā ca lāṭānuprāso dvidhā mantavyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:612: tatra yadyapi arthapaunaruktyaṃ lakṣaṇam, athāpi śabdapaunaruktyaṃ doṣabhayādaṅgīkriyata eva /
GK16ruyalscu:620: yatra tāveva śabdārthau tātparyaṃ tu vibhidyate /
GK16ruyalscu:627: tathopamādayo 'pi sādharmyādivyapāśrayeṇa vargaśo 'vasthāyina ityava bodhitaṃ mantavyam /
GK16ruyalscu:633_1: paunaruktyaṃ tadātmakasya khaṅgabandhādicitrasya kathanaṃ paunaruktyaprastāve saṅgacchrata ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:634: nanu kathamayaṃ śabdālaṅkāraḥ? lipisanniviṣṭānāṃvarṇānāṃ vācakatvābhāvāt ityata āha-yadyapītyadi /
GK16ruyalscu:635: khaṅgādisanniveśo hi lipyakṣarāṇām eva na śrotrākāśa samavāyināmṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:636: vācakatvaṃ tu śrotrākāśasamavāyināmeva na punarlipi sanniveśinām /
GK16ruyalscu:637: itthaṃ ca sati khaṅgādibandhagatānāṃ yadyapi vācakaśabdālaṅkāratā nopapadyate,
GK16ruyalscu:639: ataḥ sthūlabuddhilālanīyatvāt vācakaśabdabahirbhāvācca nātra kavibhirādaraḥ kārya iti mantavyam /
GK16ruyalscu:642: ato yathāvyutpatti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ ca padmamuraja gomūtrikādibandhānāṃ parigraho 'bhyanujñāyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:649: śubhā vāde tattvabubhutsā(sayā?) tu (vā?) vijigīṣayā vā vādamātre vidagdhā /
GK16ruyalscu:652: dalāni dikṣu catvāri catvāri ca vigikṣu, prathamākṣaraṃ karṇikāyām /
GK16ruyalscu:653: atha daleṣu dvayaṃ dvayamakṣarāṇāṃ prāgdalāt prādakṣiṇyena pāṭhaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:655: atrāyaṃ niṣkarṣaḥ- karṇikāyāṃ likhedekaṃ dvau dikṣu vivikṣu ca /
GK16ruyalscu:665: upamīyate sādharmyaṃ nayatītyupamānam aprākaraṇikor'thaḥ tacca niyamena adhikaguṇameva bhavati guṇādhāvṛtvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:666: upamīyate sādharmyaṃ nīyate ityupameyaṃ prākaraṇikor'thaḥ tacca niyamenādheyaguṇatvāt nyūnaguṇāmevaṃ bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:667: tayoryastulita bhadābhedāṃśaḥ samānadharmābhisambandhaḥ , sa upamālaṅkāra iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:673: ato merusarṣapādau vivakṣayā parikalpayituṃ śakyo 'pi upamānopameyabhāvo nālaṅkāraviṣayaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:675: bhedābhedetyasya vyāvartya darśayituṃ sādharmyaṃ prakārānvivinakti sādharmye yatra ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:681: bhegābhedatulyatva evopamā syāditi yaduktaṃ tatprāmāṇikasaṃvādena draḍhayitumāha-yadāhurityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:685: sadṛśatāyāḥ upamāyā; sādharmyavaidharmyayoḥ tulayā vṛttāvupamā syāditi yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:686: yadetadasyā uddeśe prāthamyaṃ tatra prayojanaṃ darśayati-upamaiva ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:696: candra eva na mukham iti apahnutaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:699: asyāṃ prāvṛṣi mukhaṃ candrabimbañca vicchrāyamityekā tulyayogitā /
GK16ruyalscu:702: mukhameva ramyaṃ candra eva hṛdya iti prativastūpamā /
GK16ruyalscu:707: na mukhena vinā candraḥ samīcīnā itivinīktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:711: mukhe roṣo na doṣāya nahīndo rnindāyai kalaṅkarekhetyarthāntanyāsaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:721: ayaṃ punarācāryaḥ sarvasyaivopamāprapañcasya anyaiḥ anupapāditacara vaicitryatrayamupapādayiṣurāha-tatrāpi sādhāraṇādharmasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:723: mukhaṃ candra iva hṛdyamityekenaiva rūpeṇa hṛdya tvādeḥsādhāraṇadharmasya nirdeśaḥ kriyate ityekaṃ vaicitryam /
GK16ruyalscu:725: ekor'tho vastutvenopameyagataḥ prativastutvena nirdiśyata iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:728: “valitakandharamānanamāvṛttavṛntaśatapatranibham” ityādau hi yena saha saṃbadhnāti sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ sa sambandhī,
GK16ruyalscu:729: kevalaṃ bhinnaḥ ekatra kandharā aparatra vṛntaṃ tadbhedopādhinā svayamabhinno 'pi abhedodharmobhedena nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:733: abhinna dharmasya bhedena nirdeśe nyāyoyaḥsa ihāpi saṃbhavatīti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:735: abhinnadharmasya bhedena nirdeśe nyāyoyaḥsa ihāpi saṃbhavatīti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:736: yadā punaraṃsārpita hāro 'yaṃ sanirjharodgāra ivetyādau sādharmyaṃ dharmidvārakaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:743: yā yāvatī saṃbhavatyupamāpūrṇā lutpā ca saprabhedaprapañcā sā sarvaivāsmadupadarśitena vaicitryatrayeṇa tridhā prathata iti /
GK16ruyalscu:745: prabhāpekṣayā mahatīti kathanāt svāpekṣayā tanvīti vivakṣyate /
GK16ruyalscu:747: ubhe hi khalu ete svāpekṣayā tanīyasyau prabhāpekṣayā tu mahatyau /
GK16ruyalscu:749: tatra vācisaṃskāro vyākṛtiḥ, devyāṃ tu nisargasiddhadivyānubhāvavāsanānuvṛttiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:753: itthaṃ ca satyanupāttasyāpi sādhāraṇadharmasyānu gāmitayaikarūpyeṇa nirdeśa udāhṛto mantavyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:754: yadvā trimārgayetyetadeva tantreṇa nyāyena devīviśeṣaṇatayāpi saṅgacchrate /
GK16ruyalscu:764: yāntyā upavanātpuraṃ prati kareṇukayā gacchantyāsahacarīsaṃllāpādivyapadeśena vāraṃvāramapavṛttaśirodharā,
GK16ruyalscu:765: ata eva āvṛttavṛntasya kalahaṃsakarṇakaṇḍūyanādinā vivalitabandhanasya kuśeśayasya sadṛśyam ānanam vahantyāḥ kaṭākṣo me hṛdaye nikhātaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:766: apāṅge nikṣitpā cakṣuḥprabhā sa kaṭākṣaḥ, saḥ kīlita iva /
GK16ruyalscu:767: kena prakāreṇa? gāḍhaṃ paricālyāpi utkīlayituṃ na śakyate, yathā tatheti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:768: kīṭṭakkaṭākṣaḥ? amṛtena digdhaḥ litpaḥ, yatastadā jīvāturabhūt /
GK16ruyalscu:770: atraika eva dharmaḥsambandhibhedena valitāvṛttaśabdābhyāṃ vastuprativastubhāvena nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:779: nanu upameyatvamupamānatvaṃ ca kathamekatraiva saṅgacchta ityāha-vācyābhiprāyeṇotyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:780: pūrvaṃ rūpamupameyatvaṃ tadanugamo vācyābhiprāyeṇa yatpunarapūrvaṃ rūpamupamānatvaṃ tadanugamo vyaṅgyābhiprāyeṇeti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:781: nanvekatra viruddhadharmopanibandhalabhyaḥ kor'tha ityata āha-ekasya tu viruddhetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:784: yata itthaṃ sadṛśāntarasyānanvayaḥ ataḥsaṃjñeyamanvarthetyāha-ata evānanvaya ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:789: atra prathamārjunabhīmaśabdau vācyaparau, caramau tu vyaṅgyaparau /
GK16ruyalscu:802: itthaṃ ca satyupamānopameyabhāvavyatyayo vākyaikavākyatāmantareṇa na saṃbhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:826: iyaṃ yoddhukāmaṃ lavamālokya sakautukasya sūtasya candraketuṃ pratyuktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:830: atra hi pūrvānubhūtārthadarśanādeva smṛtiḥ na tu sadṛśānubhavāt /
GK16ruyalscu:835: kintu mṛgayānivṛttyādikaṃ smartavyasutpiviśeṣaṇamata iṣṭārtho 'pi na bhavatītyabhavanmatayogākhyo 'yaṃ doṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:836: nanu yadi preyo 'laṅkāro ratibhāvātmakaḥ, na tadā smṛtiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:838: tato 'sya smaraṇālaṅkārasya kiṃ vaidharmyamityata āha-preyo 'saṅkārāsya tvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:840: atrābhiniviṣṭasya nāyakasya priyānurāgasaṃskārāṇāṃ saskārāntarābhibhāva katayābhūyobhūyaḥsamuddhudhyamānānāṃ mahimnaiva smṛtiḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:843: vibhāvānubhāvādibhiḥ yadā smṛtirvyajyate, tadaiva hi bhāvālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:850: iha tu karaṇaṃ nopalabhāmaha ityata āha-karaṇāsyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:851: kṛñbhvastyarthānāṃ sarvadhātvanuyāyitvāt kriyāyāḥsāmānyātmā karotyarthaḥ darśane 'pi saṃbhavata /
GK16ruyalscu:860: nanu smararipudarśanakautukāstamaye prakṛtanāyakadarśanaṃ heturiti kāvyaliṅgaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-matāntara ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:861: asmaddarśane viśeṣālaṅkāraḥ, matāntare kāvyaliṅgaṃ, smaraṇaṃ tu sarvatra na bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:869: candratvādyāropasya yo viṣayo mukhādiḥ tasyānapahnavaśca rūpakālaṅkāra iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:872: athāropa śabdārthaṃ vivṛṇvan vyudasanīyaviṣayavivecanapuraskāreṇa viṣayamasya vivecayati-āropo 'nyatrānyeti /
GK16ruyalscu:874: sa ca dviṣṭhatvāt viṣayiṇā viṣayeṇa cāvaṣṭabhyate /
GK16ruyalscu:876: yadā candra eva na mukhamiti viṣayasyāpahnavaḥ tadāpahnutyalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:879: viṣayī viṣayaṃ svena rūpeṇa rūpavantaṃ karotīti rūpakamityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:890: iha yāvānalaṅkāravargo vivecayiṣyate, vivecitacaraśca, sa sarvaścaiva(tasya sarvasyaiva?)
GK16ruyalscu:902: samastāni niravaśeṣāṇi viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyātmakāni vastūni viṣayo yasya tat samastavastuviṣayam /
GK16ruyalscu:903: yatpunaḥ viśeṣaṇāṃśe kvacinna kriyate viśeṣaṇāṃśāntare viśeṣye ca kriyate tadekadeśa eva viśiṣya vartanādekadeśavivarti /
GK16ruyalscu:905: śliṣṭaśabdam aśliṣṭaśabdaṃ ceti dvairūpyamanuprapadya pratisvaṃ kevalaṃ mālārūpaṃ ceti pratama ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:915: yadā tu viśeṣaṇāṃśa rūpaṇabalādeva viśeṣye rūpakamarthādavagamyate, tadā samāsoktirūpakam /
GK16ruyalscu:917: evamādibhedāḥ sthūlatayā na pratanyanta iti āha-anyetvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:928: atra grāmyajanoktau samastapadārthaviṣayatvāt samastavastuviṣayaṃ sāvayavaṃ rūpakam /
GK16ruyalscu:932: atra kīrtīnāṃ haṭhahṛtamahilātvamarthāt pratīyata iti ekadeśa vivarti sāvayavam /
GK16ruyalscu:933: kṣitibhṛta ityaṃśe tu saṃkaraḥ ityabhiprāyeṇāha-kṣitibhṛta ityatretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:935: atra na hanti kimityādau nāñā prathamato hananādināṣedhaḥ kimiti kākvā nirākriyate /
GK16ruyalscu:937: atra vaktrenduriti rūpaṇam yasyenduniṣṭhasya pīyūṣasya hetuḥ tadadharāmṛtena saha śliṣṭam /
GK16ruyalscu:939: ata indurūpaṇadvārā bhātatvāt paraṃparitaṃ kevalaṃ ca /
GK16ruyalscu:943: vairiṇāṃ kamalāyāḥ lakṣmyāḥ saṅkoca eva kamalānāmasaṅkocaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:946: tadabhāva eva durgāyāḥ kātyāyinyā mārgaṇaṃ tatra nīlalohitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:947: samitaḥ saṃgrāmāḥ tā eva samidha edhāṃsi tatsvīkāre vaiśvānaraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:951: dakṣaḥ dakṣaprajāpatiḥ vijaye prāgbhāvo 'gresaratā sa eva vijayādarjunātprāgbhāvaḥ purojanma tatra bhīma!vatsaraśatamityantasaṃyoge dvitīyā /
GK16ruyalscu:953: atra viduṣāṃ mānasetvaṃ haṃsa iti pratītau kathamasya haṃsatvamiti vimarśo jāto,
GK16ruyalscu:955: tathāvagamitena śleṣeṇa haṃsatvameva vyavatiṣṭhata iti śliṣṭaśabda paraṃparitamṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:960: dakṣabhīmapadayoḥ śleṣa eva pratītiviśrāntaḥ aṃśāntaramihodāharaṇamiti sarvamavadātam /
GK16ruyalscu:972: nanukṣmāsauvidalla ityatra bhūmeḥ mahiṣyādirūpaṇamaśābdamityata āha-atra kṣmetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:977: na kevalamidaṃ paraṃparitaṃ rūpakam anvayamukhenaiva yāvatā vyatirekamukhenāpi saṃbhavatītyāha-idaṃ cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:984: tatra kā gatirityata āha - atra cāropyamāṇasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:985: satyam, āviṣṭaliṅgasaṅkhyākatvaṃ dharmiṇo yuktaṃ, tatra liṅgānyathā karaṇo gatirasti kācit /
GK16ruyalscu:997: tairetaiḥ nimittairaṣṭabhiḥ viṣakāryaireva garalarūpor'thaṃ udbhāvyata iti neha viṣaśabdaśleṣo rūpakahetukaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1000: evaṃvidhe viṣaye śleṣa eva na tu rūpakamityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1022: tasmādāropyamāṇaṃ candratvādimukhādau prakṛtārthe tādrūpyapratītyādhānarūpeṇa uparañjakatvenaiva rūpakālaṅkāre 'nvayaṃ bhajate /
GK16ruyalscu:1024: pariṇāmālaṅkāre punaḥ āropyamāṇaṃ na kevalaṃ prakṛtoparañjakaṃ yāvatā prakṛtarūpamapahnuvānaṃ sattadātmatvenopayujyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1034: itthaṃ ca sati viṣayitvāropaṇaṃ viṣaye tādrūpyapratītimātraṃ cedvivakṣyate,
GK16ruyalscu:1035: tadā tādrūpyapratīti janakatva mātramu parañjakatvam itye tāvataiva āropaṇasya caritārthatā /
GK16ruyalscu:1036: atastādrūpyapratītimātra prasiddhyarthaṃ prakṛtam (a)prakṛta rūpāpānnaṃ bhavati rūpake /
GK16ruyalscu:1039: itarathā rūpakanyāyena prakṛtasya svarūpasthaganena prakṛtameva na pratīyeta /
GK16ruyalscu:1055: na khalvayaṃ kāvye lakṣaṇapariṇāmaḥ āgamarūpeṇa vā anumānarūpeṇa vā khyā (ta i)
GK16ruyalscu:1057: tatrāpi sāṅkhyayogādiśāstraviṣayeṇa pratijñātaṃ khalvasmābhiḥ śrīguruprasādasamanantaraṃ śaiśava eva yathā - “śaivaṃ viṣṇunibaddhamaupaniṣadaṃ sāṅkhyaṃ sapātañjalaṃ /
GK16ruyalscu:1059: bhūtānāṃ tu vinodanāya bharataṃ nīrti ca vātsyāyanaṃ /
GK16ruyalscu:1063: dustārkikajaradgavān pratyāpahālaparasya mamāyamanyaḥ ślokaḥ- sāṅkhyaṃ veśmani veśmani śrutiśiraḥ kakṣyāsu kakṣyāsu ca dvāri dvāri śivāgamāḥ pathi pathi prācāṃ kavīnāṃ giraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1066: mahārāja vīraballālāsthānajuṣāṃ viduṣāṃ prasādāśiṣo hi mayyetāḥ prathante /
GK16ruyalscu:1069: prākṛta pṛthvīśvaraḥ śaurasenī śiromaṇi magidhīmakaradhvajaḥ ṣaiśācīparameśvaro 'pabhraṃśarājahaṃso 'laṅkāracakravartī dhvaniprasthānaparamācāryaḥ sahajasarvajña(ḥ)
GK16ruyalscu:1075: veśaṣyābhujaṅga ityādyā mahārājahosalarāja kuladvāri praśasti śilāśāsanaprabhṛtibhiḥ vayamupaśāntarabhasāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1076: atra tu granthe kāvyamīmāṃ(sā)nikaṣatāṃ mamopayāntu vatsalāḥsacetasaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1078: sā cāyaṃ pariṇāmālaṅkāro dvirūpa iti vyutpādayati-tasya sāmānādhikaraṇyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1086: atrātarasyā prakṛtasyā na kevalaṃ maitrītādrūpyapratītimātraṃ vivakṣyate,
GK16ruyalscu:1088: ataḥ aprakṛtasya prakṛtarūpāpannasya prakṛtopayoga iti prakṛtasya svarūpādapracyuteḥ pariṇāmatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:1091: prakṛtarūpāpannasya prakṛtopayoga iti pariṇāmabījabhūtaṃ upayogitvamuddhāṭayitumāha-bhrātasasya maitrītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1092: yata itthaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayoge pariṇāmālaṅkārasya viṣayavyavasthātasmāt samāsoktisādharmyamastīti vyutpipādayuṣurupakramate-tavatra yathetyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:1094: upoḍharāgeṇa vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā nasāmukham /
GK16ruyalscu:1095: yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgādgalitaṃ na lakṣitam //
GK16ruyalscu:1097: na lakṣita[mi]ti vākyānupreśāntaṃ vivakṣita iti prakṛtopayogī /
GK16ruyalscu:1101: na tu rūpakanyāyena rūpasamāropamātramityaṃśe pariṇāmasamāsoktyoḥ sādharmyamavagantavyamityata āha-evamihāpīti /
GK16ruyalscu:1104: nanu yadi dvayoḥ prayogastarhi pariṇāmatvameva kathamityata āha-tādātmyāttviti /
GK16ruyalscu:1105: na khalu tādātmye sati “kṣīraṃ dadhīti” prayogamātrāt pariṇāmatvahāniḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1122: nanu viṣayatve nirjñāte 'kaḥsandeha ityāha-viṣaya(ḥ) prakṛta ityādi' /
GK16ruyalscu:1123: nirjñātameva ṇukhādilakṣaṇaṃ prakṛtamarthaṃ bhittī kṛtya candrādāvaprakṛter'thesandihyamāne sandehasya dviṣṭhatvāt prakṛtor'tho 'pi sandehaḍolāmadhirohati /
GK16ruyalscu:1124: itthaṃ prakṛtāprakṛtagatatvena ya utthāpyate pratibhayaiva sandehaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:1125: sa sandeho 'laṅkāraḥ na tu sthāṇupuruṣādāviva svarasavāhī /
GK16ruyalscu:1135: sarvā diśo na prasaratīti ūrdhva jvalanaikasvabhāva rūpatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1137: atrāsaṅkhya turagatvā dinā mārtaṇḍatvadisandehāpagama eva jāyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1138: tena punarnāyakasya śṛṅgrāhikayā rūpanirjñānamiti niścayābhāsā ete /
GK16ruyalscu:1142: parato niścitamiti kathanāt dvitīyārdhānte itthaṃ sandihyetyadhyāhāryam /
GK16ruyalscu:1143: kvacitpunarviṣaye saṃśayitavye 'pira āropyamāṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ viṣayāntaratvamapi bhavatīti āha-kvacidityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1148: nanvatra sambhāvanāpi pratīyata iti kathaṃ sandehālaṅkāra ityata āha-kecidadhyavasāyetyādi //
GK16ruyalscu:1166: niṣpatya ālīya sādṛśyāditi yaduktaṃ tatra pratyudājihīrṣurāha-gāḍhamarmetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1173: alaukikatvanayo 'yaṃ sandehe 'pi samāna iti vyutpādayati-evaṃ sthāṇurityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1191: tāmanatikramya rucyādiṣu triṣu yathāyogamekaṃ dvayaṃ trayameva vā prayojakaṃ bhavatītiyāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:1194: rurcyarthitvavyutpattyanusāreṇa ekasminnapyanusandhānena sādhite nirdhāriter'the ābhāsaḥ pratītirbhidyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1199: janapade hi tapovanatvādi dharmā nisargata eva santi /
GK16ruyalscu:1203: samastā vyastā iti munyādīnāṃ tapovanā ditvenollekhe tathāvidhā rucyādayo hi samastatayā vyastatayā vā saṃbhavanti /
GK16ruyalscu:1207: yatra tvaṃśe rūpakaṃ tatra yadyullekhātmikā vicchittirna saṃbhavati tadā nāstyeva vivādaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1208: atha saṃbhavati, tadā saṅkara eva nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1219: na hyanekadhāgrahaṇarūpaṃ vaicitryaṃ bhrāntimānapi svalakṣaṇopapanna ityata āha-saṅkarapravṛttistviti /
GK16ruyalscu:1221: vastuto hitapovanādyavayavāpekṣayā na jana padasyāvayavino bhedo 'sti /
GK16ruyalscu:1222: itthaṃ ca satyabhede bheda ityevaṃ rūpātiśayoktiratrāstu kiṃ manyakalpanenetyākṣepaniṣkarṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1231: nārāyaṇa iti pariṇatavayobhiḥ śrīvallabha iti taruṇībhaiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1233: atra puraḥ praveśāvasare eka eva kṛṣṇo jaratībhiḥ sākṣānmokṣaprado nārāyaṇa itidṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1238: na cātra śaṅkanīyaṃ kautukeneti prayojakāntaropādānānneha rucyādayaḥ prayojakā iti /
GK16ruyalscu:1241: vacasi viṣayabhūte guruḥ prāmāṇikatvāt anullaṅghyo vācaspatiśca /
GK16ruyalscu:1244: ityādau hyeka eva upavarṇyo nāyako vacaḥ-pramukharviṣayabhedādgrahītṛbhedanairapekṣyeṇa rucyādivaśāt anekadhā gṛhyata ityullekhālaṅkāratvam /
GK16ruyalscu:1248: ato lakṣaṇopapannam alaṅkārāntaraṃ sati śleṣe na syāditi nātrollekho yukta ityākṣepaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1252: athāpi svarūpeṇa avidyamānasya bādhāsaṃbhavāt bādha evollekhasadbhāve liṅgam /
GK16ruyalscu:1254: yata itthamato na tu sarvathā tadabhāva ityalaṅkārāntarameva /
GK16ruyalscu:1255: etadeva sādhayitum atraivodāharaṇe śleṣanairapekṣyaṃ darśayati-yadevaṃvidha ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1256: atra “anullaṅghyo vacasi, prathīyān urasi, nirmalo yaśasi” iti śleṣābhāve 'pi na ullekhābhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1257: yasmāditthaṃ tasmādevamādau viṣaye ullekhālaṅkāra eva viśeṣavicchittika iti alaṅkārāntarāpekṣayā śreyān praśasyatara ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1271: yadyapi śleṣato bādho na tathāpyasya nihnavaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1275: nanu mukhaṃ na bhavatīti viṣayāpahnavamātre satyapi nāpahnutirityato 'dhikāraṃ smārayati-vastvantarapratītirityeveti /
GK16ruyalscu:1277: tathāhi kāvyaprakāśakṛt- “prakṛtaṃ yanniṣidhyānyat sādhyate sā tvapahnutiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1278: ” nanu yadi sādṛśyādvastvantarapratītirihāpi ko viśeṣaḥ tarhyasya bhrāntimata ityata āha-prakāntānapahvavetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1282: ullekhe tu na prakṛtānapahnavamātraṃ viśeṣaḥ kintu anekadhāgrahaṇamapi jñeyam /
GK16ruyalscu:1293: tarhi tṛtīyabhede ko vicchrittiviśeṣaḥ ityata āha-pūrvaka ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1295: no māṃ prati tatheti prakṛtāpahnavaḥ uttarārdhe 'prakṛtasādhanamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:1296: yadyapi apahnutireṣā tathāpi doṣānuviddhatvāt udāharaṇābhāsa ityata āha-atraindavasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1298: apahnotumiṣyasya śaśakasya yaḥ prativastubhūta ulkāpātakiṇaḥ tasyaivāropo nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1300: itthaṃ lakṣaṇopapanno 'pi alaṅkāro doṣānuviddhaḥsan ābhāsī bhavatīti vyutpādya samyagudājihīrṣurāha-tattu yatheti //
GK16ruyalscu:1303: tenonnaddhaḥ utsikto janaḥ śṛṅgārī lokaḥ tasyābhimānaḥsāntvāsahiṣṇutā /
GK16ruyalscu:1305: atra na maṇḍalam api tu ātapatramevetyanvayo ghaṭate ayamapahnavapūrvaka āropaḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:1314: ambhaḥ kaṇairbhaṣṭamityatra hi na muktāphalāni, api tu ambhaḥ kaṇā eveti pratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1315: itthamevāpahnutim utprekṣāṅgatvena pratipipādayuṣurupakṣipati-atra śūnyaṃ ityasya ityādi //
GK16ruyalscu:1322: nanu cchralādiprayoge 'pyapahnavāropapaurvāparyaviparyayanibandhanaṃ vaicitryaṃ kiṃ nocyata ityata āha-etasminnapīti //
GK16ruyalscu:1327: ekavāsyatāyāṃ tu cchralādi śabdasya paurvāparyaviparyayaprasaṅge 'pi na pratītibhedaḥkaścit /
GK16ruyalscu:1328: kriyāviśeṣaṇatvena kriyāpekṣayā pratītau prāthamyaniyamāt atha śchrālādiprayoge dvidhā na gaṇitam /
GK16ruyalscu:1333: antardhānaṃ rātripakṣe tiraskṛtiḥ vilayaḥ, anyatra tvaddaśyatvasiddhiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1340: atra hi dhūmaśikhā romāvalivapuḥ pariṇamatītyuktau , na romāvalirapitu dhūmaśikheti pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1354: sa ca loke dvirūpaḥ samyagātmā mithyārūpaśca /
GK16ruyalscu:1356: nahi śuktiriti samyagadhyavasāye rajatamiti mithyādhyavasāye vā vicchittiḥ kācit /
GK16ruyalscu:1357: ubhaya visakṣaṇāstu jānato 'pyetasmin tadeveti yo 'dhyāsarūpasya ihālaṅkāratvena parigṛṅyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1361: itthaṃ ca satyadhyavasāye viṣayabhūte yadā adhyavasānasya prādhānyaṃ tadotprekṣālaṅkāra iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1365: viṣayaṃ nigīrṇavato viṣayiṇo viṣayitādātmyena pratītasya ihādhyavasāyo abhimata iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:1367: vyāpāraprādhānyagrahaṇasya vyāvartyamuddhāṭayitumāha- sa ca dvividha ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1370: uttaravākyagato 'pi yacchabdaḥ pūrvavākyācchabdopādānanirapekṣa eva tadarthena sambandhamīṣṭe /
GK16ruyalscu:1371: yatra viṣayiṇo 'satyatayā pratītiḥ sa sādhya ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1373: mukhaṃ mukhatvena jānanneva yadā nūnaṃ candra iti saṃbhāvayati tadā viṣayī candro mukhatvenāsatyaḥ pratibhāti tadādhyavasāyaḥ sādhyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1374: nanu sādhya evāstu adhyavasāyaḥ siddho vā,
GK16ruyalscu:1375: abhedapratītau kathamasatyatvaṃ ityata āha- asatyatvaṃ cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1378: nūnaṃ candra ityasyāṃ daśāyāṃ viṣayiṇyeva saṃbhavatyayaṃ viṣathayetu na saṃbhavatīti pratīyamānatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1383: tadāśrayasya satyatvāsatyatva pratītirityata āha-dharmo guṇakriyārūpaḥ ityādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:1384: guṇakriyārūpa iti dharmasya sākalyakathanāt tadubhayamūlatayā utprekṣāsaṃbhavasmūcitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1385: asya hi dharmasya saṃbhavo 'saṃbhavaśca viṣayyāśrayatayā saṃbhavaḥ asaṃbhavastu viṣayāśrayatayā /
GK16ruyalscu:1387: kutaḥ? saṃbhavāśrayasya tatrāvasthāyāṃ paramārthabuddhyanudayāt asatyatvaṃ pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1391: yata itthamadhyavasāyaḥ sādhyaḥ ataḥ utprekṣāyāmadhyavasāyavyāpārasyaiva prādhānyamityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1394: sa iti dyotitaḥ ko 'sāvityata āha - yatra viṣayiṇo vastuta ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1395: yadā tu mukhamuddaśya candro 'pamiti prayogaḥ tadā vastuto 'satyo 'pi viṣayī satyatayā pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1399: yadā sādhyatvapratītiḥ tadādhyavasāyasya paryāyān vyutpādayati - tatra sādhyatveti /
GK16ruyalscu:1405: prakṛtaṃ hi lau kikaṃ kavikḷtpa vicchrattividhuratayā na vaicitryāya /
GK16ruyalscu:1411: atha saṃbhāvyasya hetvādi rūpatayā punastraividhyamāha-teṣu ca pratyekamityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1417: lakṣaṇāparīkṣayostu kṛtayoḥ katicana hīyanta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1421: nimittānupādānaṃ na saṃbhavatīti yatpratijñātaṃ tatpramāṇo na draḍhayati-ivādyanupādāna ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1423: anupāttanimittakā hi yā vācyotprekṣā tasyām ivādyupādānabalādevotprekṣaṇapratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1426: prāyograhaṇāt paryāyoktanayena svarūpasya kvacitsaṃbhavadapyutprekṣaṇaṃ gamyasyāpibhaṅgyantarābhidhānānna nirāpaṇārhamiti dyotitam /
GK16ruyalscu:1439: tathā ca pratyekaṃ triskandhikā etā hetusvarūpaphalotprekṣaṇatayā skandhatrayamapi pratisvamaṣṭavidham /
GK16ruyalscu:1444: anayaivarītyā svarūpotprekṣāskandhaḥ phalotprekṣāskandhaśca pratisvamaṣṭavidheti jātyutprekṣā triskandhatayā caturviśatidhā /
GK16ruyalscu:1448: pratīyamānāyāṃ tu anupāttanimittāyā niravaśeṣaṃ pāte aṣṭacatvāriśaddhāniḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1457: tathāpi dharmaviṣayeśliṣṭaśabdahetukā saṃbhavatyeṣā na bādhyate, na cobhayālaṅkāraprātpiriti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:1465: ye ca vakṣyante teṣāṃ vaicitryādasyā iyattaiva nāstītyāha-ataścoktavakṣyamāṇetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1466: nanu yadyānantyaṃ kathamudāharaṇato darśayiṣyate ityata āha-sāmpratantvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1468: yathā diṅmātreṇodāhṛtā api nyāyataḥsākalyena jñātuṃ śakyate, tatheti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:1474: tatra yadyapi svarūpamutprekṣyate na tu hetuphale, athāpyuddeśakramavirodhātsoṃ'śo nodājihīrṣitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1480: na ca mantavyaṃ varṣaṇasya nabhaḥkartṛkatvāt na tamogatatvamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:1481: nabhaso 'pi tamasādhiṣṭhintasyaiva varṣaṇakartṛkatvasaṃbhavādanena paraṃparāyātāyā api sambhāvanāyā utprekṣātvaṃ dyotitam /
GK16ruyalscu:1497: udāharaṇacatuṣke 'pi anugataṃ viśeṣam uddhāṭayati-etāni bhāvābhimāna ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1517: atha nimittopādānānupādānābhyāṃ ṣoḍaśakasya yaddvaividhyaṃ pratijñātaṃ tatra nimittopādānasya samanantarodāharaṇānyevodāharaṇatvena darśayati - ete nimittetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1519: atra lepanāditvena saṃbhāvane vyāpanādi nimittaṃ nopāttam /
GK16ruyalscu:1533: atra niśvāsasya svarūpamevotprekṣyaṃ, na tu hetuḥ phalaṃ vā /
GK16ruyalscu:1547: arthāśriyāpi dharmaviṣaye śliṣṭa śabdahetukā saṃbhavatīti yoddiṣṭā tāmudāharati-śliṣṭaśabdetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1552: mārgaṇaviṣayībhāvo dharmaḥ saṃbhāvanāśaṃ eva pratītiviśrānteḥ śleṣo notprekṣābādhakaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1558: “sarvaprātipadikebhya upamānārthe kvip ityeke ācāryā” iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1560: kaṇṭhatviṣāṃ tilakādirūpatvaniyamāsiddheḥ tilakādirūpatāpi kadācitsyādupamānāṃśe saṃbhāvanāprāṇatvameva natu vāstavatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:1563: upamānasya tilakādeḥ prakṛte kaṇṭhatviṅruḍpe saṃbhavaicityāt saṃbhāvanamātrasyocitatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1574: yattu vyaktivivekakṛdīddaśi viṣaye manyate-“ivādiśabdaireva prakṛtārthasyāsattvapratīteḥ chralādiśabdāḥ punaraktā” iti tat mandam /
GK16ruyalscu:1575: na khalvīddaśi viṣaye chalādiśabdāprayoge 'pi prakṛtārthasyāsatyāsatyatā gamyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1576: api tu utprekṣāṃ prati hetubhāva eva /
GK16ruyalscu:1580: athotprekṣāyā eva prapañcanārthaṃ tattadalaṅkārabījabhūta tattatpadāvāpoddhārābhyām alaṅkāravaicitryamāvirbhavatīti vyutpādayati-apara ivetyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:1586: kutracittu kāmacāraḥ iti vyutpipādayiṣurhetūtprekṣāṃ tāvat vyutpādayati-tadevaṃprakāretyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:1589: sa dharmo 'dhyavasāyavaśāt abhedopacaraṇavaśāt abhinna utprekṣānimittamāśrīyate niyamena vācyo bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:1591: yadaivaṃ na syāt tadotprekṣamāṇo heturabhittikameva citraṃ syādityāha-anyathā kaṃ pratīti /
GK16ruyalscu:1593: atra kapolau prakṛtau tatsaṃbandhī dharmaḥ kṣāmatā taddhetutvena darśanamutprekṣatam /
GK16ruyalscu:1594: tadutprekṣaṇe ca na kevalā kapolakṣāmatā nimittam,
GK16ruyalscu:1595: api tu loke parasparamadraṣṭroryā kṣāmatā tadabhinnatvenā dhyavasitā saivaṃ cotprekṣitā darśanalakṣaṇasya hetoḥ phalam /
GK16ruyalscu:1598: adarśanaṃ pratya prakṛtaiva hi kṣāmatā phalaṃ, tatra nimittaṃ hetūtprekṣaṇe prayojakam /
GK16ruyalscu:1603: tadutprekṣaṇe ca laukikaduḥkhamaunatvābhedenādhyavasitaṃ nūpuramaunitvameva nimittaṃ duḥkotprekṣaṇaphalaṃ ca /
GK16ruyalscu:1613: atha dharmasya dharmigatatvenādhyavasāne nimittopādānānupādāne darśayati-yatra ca dharmaṃ evetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1619: nanu dharme dharmotprekṣaṇavaicitryāya vyāpane lepanamutprekṣyatāmityata āha-vyāpānādau tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:1623: ato 'navagatasya kalpanamavagatasya parityāga iti doṣadvayamāpatediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1625: yadi vyāpanameva utprekṣaṇaviṣayaḥ na hi tasyagamyamānatā yuktā /
GK16ruyalscu:1630: tasya phalasya yadeva lokasthityā kāraṇaṃ , tadevotprekṣaṇanimittam /
GK16ruyalscu:1631: taccennopādīyeta, tadevotprekṣyamāṇaṃ phalaṃ kasya phalatayoktaṃ syāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1636: tadanupādāne parivartamānaṃ utprekṣyamāṇaṃ kasya phalaṃ syāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1638: anenāśīcilidhatvena dṛṣṭeṣu prabhedeṣu punaḥ keṣāñcit pātodarśitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1639: tathāhi-upāttanimittā ye ṣoḍaṣabhedāsteṣāṃ pratisvaṃ hetusvarūpa phalotprekṣaṇarūpatve aṣṭacatvāriṃśat /
GK16ruyalscu:1648: atha manyepramukhasya śabdasya saṃbhāvanādyotakatve 'pi tatprayogamātreṇotprekṣābhramo na kārya iti vyutpādayati-asyāścetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1659: hetau svarūpe cotprekṣye phale ṣaṇṇāvatiḥ punaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1686: atra mukhanayanagātralakṣaṇānviṣayān nigīrya kamalakuvalayakanakalatālakṣaṇā viṣayiṇaḥ tadabhedenādhyavasitāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1698: ityatra pariṇātavayaskānāṃ śrīvallabhatvābhede 'pi nārāyaṇa iti (bhe)dena dṛṣṭastathaivābhiruceḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1700: bālānāṃ tu yatkiñciditi nūtanaṃ vastu draṣṭavyamityeva, tathā vyutpatteḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1701: yadvā pratyekaṃ samastā rucyarthitvavyutpattayobhedadṛṣṭau nimittaṃ prapañcitam ullekhaprastāve /
GK16ruyalscu:1712: atra puṣpapravālādikayoḥ sākṣādasambandhe 'pi yadīti saṃbhāvanayā sambandhaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1714: na ca mantavyaṃ saṃbhāvanāyāṃ vyāpāraprādhānyāt atrotprekṣaiveyamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:1719: atra dāhabāṣpaśvāsavapuṣāmambhaḥ prasṛtiṃ pacatvapraṇālocitatvadīpakalikāpreṅkholanapāṇḍimamajjaneṣu saṃbandhābhāve api siddhatvenoktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1730: atra tvāyāto mṛtā iti niṣṭhābhyāṃ tayoḥsamakālatā /
GK16ruyalscu:1731: nanu bhede 'bhedādikatha namasaṅgatam ityata āha-eṣu pañcasviti /
GK16ruyalscu:1733: ato bhede 'bhedarūpo mukhyārtho na vivakṣita itiyāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:1736: yadiha bhede 'bhedādirūpāyā atiśayoktinimittabhūtaṃ prayojakamatiśayākhyaṃ phalaṃ tatrābhedādhyavasāyo, na tu phalinoḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1738_1: sahābhedenādhyavasitaṃ sadbhede 'bhedādivacanasya nimittaṃ kamalamukhādikayorabhedādhyavasāyo yojayituṃ śakyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1739: tathāsati avyātpidoṣaḥ syādityata āha-abhede bheda ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1743: abhede vāstave yadā bhedakathanaṃ na hi tadā phalinorabhedādhyavasāyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1744: phalaṃ tu tatrāpyabhedenaivādhyavasīyata ityata āha-aṇṇaṃ laḍahattaṇaaṃ ityādāviti /
GK16ruyalscu:1745: aṇṇaṃ laḍahattaṇaamityādau hi yat vastu tasmiddhaṃ laḍahatvaṃ yaccānyatvena kavisamarpitaṃ sātiśayaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:1749: tatrāpi khalu “lāvaṇyadraviṇe“tyādau vedhaso lāvaṇyardraviṇasambandhe 'pyasaṃbandhaḥ kevalaṃ na punastanvyā naisargikalāvaṇyakavisamarpitavedhaḥsambandhi lāvaṇyayorasaṃbandhaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1753: kāryatāśrayatvāt tatrāpi saṅgatiḥ prapañcārthatvāt nānarthakyamiti sarvamavadātam /
GK16ruyalscu:1759: aupamyasya gamyatve padārthagatatvena prastutānāmaprastutānāṃ vā samānadharmābhisambandhe tulyayogitā // RuAss_23 //
GK16ruyalscu:1785: aśvapṛtanāyāḥsakāśāt gūrñjaranṛpasya bhagrasya mukhe patitaṃ rajaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1792: tvadaṅgamārdavaṃ paśyataḥ sarvasyaiva citte mālatyādīnāṃ kaṭhoratāvabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1807: yaścātropamānopameyabhāvaḥ sa tulyayogitāto vilakṣaṇa ityāha-sa cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1815: nanu pratisvaṃ kriyāsambandhe kathaṃ padārthagataṃ ityata āha-anekasyaikakriyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1819: rājate mihireṇa nabho rasena kāvyaṃḥ sareṇa yauvanam /
GK16ruyalscu:1827: kriyāyāḥ prathama padatvam tantramiti dyotayitum-(yathā veti) /
GK16ruyalscu:1832: kṛpaṇānāṃ dhanaṃ nāgānāṃ phaṇāmaṇiḥ kesarāṇi siṃhānām /
GK16ruyalscu:1843: vākyārthagatatvena sāmānyasya vākyadvaye pṛthaṅnirdeśa prativastūpamā // RuAss_25 //
GK16ruyalscu:1845: iha nānālaṅkāra śaṅkāmapanetuṃ viṣayaṃ vibhajati-tatra sāmānyadharmasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1847: dikamupādāya sāmānyadharmasya sakṛnnirdeśa upamāyāmevodāhṛtaṃ 'prabhāmahatyāśikhayeva dīpa' iti /
GK16ruyalscu:1849: ivādikamanupādāya yathā sakṛnnirdeśastadā prastutāprastutānāṃ samastatve dīpakaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:1859: nanu yadi dharmasyāsakṛnnirdeśarūpaṃ śuddhasāmānyarūpatvaṃ tadā kiṃ paryāyāntareṇetyata āha-kevalaṃ kāvyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1864: atha dharmyapekṣo bimbapratibimbabhāvo yadā, tadā dṛṣṭānto vakṣyata ityāha-dvitīyaprakāretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1868: dharmasya śuddhasāmānyarūpatāṃ paryāyāntaratvaṃ ca darśayati-atra caturatvamityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1879: atra bahūnāṃ vānarabhaṭaiḥ manthācalena sahadharmyapekṣo bimbapratibimbabhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1880: divyavāgupāsanasya abdhilaṅghanena gurukliṣṭatvasyā pātālanimagratvena ca dharmāpekṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1881: nanu jānāti jānīta iti jñānasya pṛthaṅnirdeśāt kathamidaṃ dṛṣṭāntodāharaṇamityata āha-atra yadyapītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1883: na hi jñānanibandhanaṃ aupamyaṃ vivakṣitaṃ, jñānasyopacārāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1884: yatra tu vivakṣā tatra na kiñcinnyūnamityata āha-yannibandhanaṃ cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1887: tvayā manasi garvābhimukhe kṛte tatkṣaṇameva dviṣo nihatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1897: saṃbhavatāsaṃbhavatā vā vastusambandhena gamyamānaṃ pratibimbakaraṇaṃnidarśanā // RuAss_27 //
GK16ruyalscu:1902: yo girirāgataṃ abhyāgataṃ raviṃ satāṃ ātitheyī atithisatkṛtiḥ kāryeti bodhayan dhatte /
GK16ruyalscu:1904_0: bo dhanasamarthasya ācārogirau prayiktaḥ tasyācetantve 'pi kārīṣo 'griradhyāpayatītivat
GK16ruyalscu:1904_1: giriḥ gṛhamedhino bodhanakriyāsamarthān karotīti tatsāmarthyācaraṇo ṇicaḥ prayogāt

GK16ruyalscu:2340: itthaṃ ca sati śaktimānātmā parāyāṃ turīyāṃ ,
GK16ruyalscu:2345_0: prabho!vaśyendriyatayā prabhavanaśīla! tava parayā devyā saha krīḍādṛḍhāliṅgane aprayāsena
GK16ruyalscu:2345_1: tādṛśī samādhisāmarasye pravṛtte bāhyā vāk kathaṃ cāṭūccāraṇācāpalaṃ sphuṭatālvoṣṭhapuṭavyāpāramakhatatāṃ
GK16ruyalscu:2346: kuto nāstītyata āha-ābhyantarī paśyantī trapayevātmānaṃ yatra tirayati,
GK16ruyalscu:2351: tatra vaikharī kathaṃ nāma pravartatām iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2353: yathā parayodevyā paṭṭamahiṣyā saha tava kriḍādṛḍhāliṅgane pravartamāne anyā kācidābhyantarī ābhyantaratvādeva yuvayorāliṅganaṃ paśyantī trapayevātmānaṃ yatra tirayati gopayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2355: madhyamāvṛttirmadhuradhvaniḥ yathā bhavati tathā ujjihāsārasāt truṭyatiṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:2357: tatra bāhyā parigrahaveśyā cāṭūccāraṇacāpalaṃ kathaṃ vitanutāmiti /
GK16ruyalscu:2362: śuddhakāryasamārope hi vilikhati kucāvityādau yat kucavilekhanādi ha(ṭha)
GK16ruyalscu:2364: kakāryaṃ tasya yadyapi na mukhyatayā yat khadirādiviśeṣaṇatvaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:2368: atha yatra samāsokterasāmañjasyaṃ tatra nyāyasañcāreṇa samañcāreṇa samañjasīkartumāha-iha tvityādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:2370: ārdranakhakṣatābham aindraṃ dhanuḥ pāṇḍupayodhareṇa dadhānā sakalaṅkaminduṃ prasādayantī śaradravestāpabhabhyadhikaṃ cakāra /
GK16ruyalscu:2382: aindraṃ dhanuḥ śarada evaviśeṣaṇaṃ na nāyikāyāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2383: nanvārdranakhakṣatābhamiti viśeṣaṇaupamyādekadeśavivartinyupamā śaradi tatsāmarthyādinduravyoḥ nāyakatvapratītirastvityata āha-na caikadeśeti /
GK16ruyalscu:2391: nanu yadyekadeśavivartinyupamāyā iha saṃbhavaḥ tadaryupamālaṅkārasyaiva prātpirma samāsokterityata āha-athātretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2395: api tu raviśaśinoreva nāyakatvavyavahāre pratītiḥ , tayorevāsyāṃ śaradi nāyakatvopacārāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2396: itthaṃ samāsoktiprātpau, tadanusāreṇa śabdanyāso nyāyya ityata āha-tadatretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2401: anyaniṣṭhasya dharmasyānyatra saṃcāraṇaṃ kutra dṛṣṭamityata āha-yathā dadhnetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2402: dadhnā juhotītyatra hi havanagatatvena vidhiḥ pratītaḥ sa tvagnihotraṃ juhotītya(ta)eva siddha iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2406: atha yatra nyāyataḥ samāsoktimapohya ekadeśavivartinyupamaiva prathate taṃ viṣayaṃ darśayitumāha-iha punariti /
GK16ruyalscu:2408: atra saraḥśriyāṃ nāyikātvapratītau nimittaṃ vivacayati-saraḥ śriyamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:2412: na tu vyavahārasasāropeṇa saraḥśrīdharmatayā ata evaṃvidhe viṣaye gatyantarābhāvādekadeśavivartinī upamaivopāsyā /
GK16ruyalscu:2417: samprati sādhiteti vyāghāta ityata āha-yatra tu keśapāśetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2418: dantaprabhāḥ puṣpāṇīvetyādi samāsenoktāyāmupamāyāṃ satyāmapi dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpairivetyādi samāsāntaramahimnā viśeṣaṇasāmyamupapadyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2420: samprati tu netrairivetyatra gatyantarābhāvādekadeśavivartinyupamaiva vyavasthāpiteti vyaghātābhāvāt sarvamavadātam /
GK16ruyalscu:2421: athārthāntaranyāsa prabhāvitāyāmasyāṃ vaicitryāntaraṃ astītyāha - sā cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2430: upagūḍhatvaṃ śāntataṭitkaṭākṣatvaṃ ca viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ tadutthāpitayā samāsoktyā nāyakavyavahārapratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2431: tathā sati samāsoktyāliṅgito yo 'yaṃ viśeṣātmā sa sāmānyātmanā arthāntaranyāsena samarthyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2433: paribhraṣṭapayodharāṇāmiti śleṣavaśādupagūḍha iti viśeṣaṇaṃ sādhāraṇatayā sphuṭam /
GK16ruyalscu:2438: veṣṭanā veṣṭanaṃ yasya mandaragireḥ, pādaḥ paryantaparvataḥ caraṇaśca /
GK16ruyalscu:2460: prasannagaṃbhīratvaṃ nāma padānāṃ vyāṅgyārthagarbhīkāra eva na tu vyaṅgyasya vācyātiśāyitā /
GK16ruyalscu:2469: kurubāndhavasya miṣataḥ karṇasya śalyasya ca na niḥsahāyasya /
GK16ruyalscu:2473: jīvatā eva na tu mūrcchitasya mṛtasya vā /
GK16ruyalscu:2483: arthadvayasya yadā prākaraṇikatvamaprākaraṇikatvameva vā tadā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ śabdasāmye śleṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2484: yadā tūbhayamayatvaṃ arthadvayasya tadā viśeṣyāṃśe pṛthagupādāne śleṣa iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2490: viśeṣyāṃśe 'pi śabdasāmyaṃ tadā arthaprakaraṇādinā abhidhāniyāsyāt na tu śleṣasya /
GK16ruyalscu:2491: anekārtho hi śabdaḥ prakaraṇādinā prākaraṇika evārthe niyamyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2492: ādye tu prakāradvaye niyamahetvabhāvāt dvāvapi vācyau /
GK16ruyalscu:2493: itthaṃ sati vikalpo vyavatiṣṭhata ityāha-ata eveti /
GK16ruyalscu:2498: abhavena asaṃsāreṇa balidaityajitkāyaḥ purāmṛtasaṃvibhāgakāle strīkṛtaḥ strībhāvaṃ nītaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2501: agaṃ govardhanaṃ gāṃ mahīṃ ca yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ varāhāvatāre adhārayat /
GK16ruyalscu:2502: yasya ca stutyaṃ nāma amaraḥ śaśimacchirohara ityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2506: atha yena dhvastamanobhavena nāśitamanmathena balijitkāyaḥ viṣṇorvapuḥ purāṇāṃ saṃharaṇe astrīkṛtaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2507: yaścedvṛndrakalāvat stutyaṃ ca nāma hara ityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2511: lubdhairmadhulaṃpaṭaiḥ vyādhaiśca bhūriti kriyāviśeṣaṇam ekadā śilīmukhairbhramaraiḥ anyadā bhūribāṇaiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2519: vaktuṃ na yātītyekadā mārgaṇaśataiḥ prayogabhedān (t)śatasaṅkhyairbāṇaiḥ duḥkhaṃ dadātītyanyadā /
GK16ruyalscu:2522: prabhuratra prākaraṇikataḥ, aprākaraṇiko manobhavaḥṣa atra viśeṣyayordvayorupādānam /
GK16ruyalscu:2535: puṣpeṣu kusumānatareṣu ruciṃ śobhāṃ puṣpabāṇapriyatāṃ ca /
GK16ruyalscu:2539: alaṅkārāntareṣvaprāpteṣu anārabhyamāṇo 'yaṃ niravakāśatvāt balīyāniti bādhitvā tatpratibhāmātra mutpādayatīti kecit /
GK16ruyalscu:2541: anye punaḥ “yena dhvastamanobhavene“ti alaṅkārāntaravivikto 'sya viṣayaḥ iti sāvakāśatvānnānyabādhakaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2542: ato 'nyasampāte saṅkaraḥ nyāyato vā daurbalye bādhyatvamityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2548: yatrobhayarūpānekārthagocaratvaṃ tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ tatra tu dīpakaṃ prabhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:2552: yata itthaṃ nāsya viviktaviṣayatā ato 'laṅkārāntarāṇi śleṣabādhitāni pratibhāmātrāvaśeṣāṇi bhavanti /
GK16ruyalscu:2553: itthaṃ sati vivakto yaḥśāṅkito viṣayaḥ so 'pi avivikta evetyāha-yena dhvastetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2554: itthaṃ vivikto yaḥśāṅkito viṣayaḥ so 'pi avivikta evetyāha-yena dhvastetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2556: alaṅkāryalaṅkaraṇabhāvo hi āśrayāśrayibhāvenopapanno loke karṇāśritaḥ karṇālaṅkāra iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2559: nanu arthabhede śabdabhedo 'pi bhinna eveti raktacchradamityādāvapi na śabdaikyamityada āha-yadyapītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2563: ataḥ sāhityasaraṇeḥ pratītyaikasāratvāt śabdaikyapratipādakadarśanāvaṣṭāmbhācca nāsti śabdabhedaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2577: itthaṃ niravakāśatvobhayālaṅkāratvasiddhau sakalakalamityādau śleṣa eva nopamā /
GK16ruyalscu:2582: tarhi rūpakasamāsoktyoḥ kuto ca bādha ityata āha-śleṣagarbhetvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2583: rūpakaṃ hi siddhaśleṣamutthāpya svasvarūpa eva viśrāmyatīti śleṣabādhakaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2584: tatrāpi yadi śleṣaḥ pūrvasiddho rūpakamutthāpya yadi svarūpe viśrāmyati,
GK16ruyalscu:2592: samāsoktau tu śliṣṭaviśeṣaṇanibandhanāyāṃ viśeṣyāṃśasya gamyatvāt samāsoktireva bādhikā /
GK16ruyalscu:2596: jagatsu trayīmayatvena prathito 'pi vivasvān vāruṇīṃ prati yadagamat /
GK16ruyalscu:2599: pātityaṃ adhaḥ pradeśasaṃyogaḥ upahatiśca patitatvādeva śuddhyaibaḍavāgnimadhyaṃ viveśetyarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2601: loketrayīmayasya sato vāruṇī sparśato yau pati tatvāgrapraveśau,
GK16ruyalscu:2604: yadyapyekaiva kriyā kartṛbhedabhinnā satyabhedenādhyavasitā sa tu tatkriyā(ekakriyā)
GK16ruyalscu:2607: ata eveti sarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭo yo virodhālaṅkāraḥ viruddhacaraṇābhāsarūpaḥ tenālaṅkṛtor'thaḥ pātityarūpa hetutvenotprekṣyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2612: tā, uttarakālaṃ tu virodhopaśama iti pratītikramaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2613: itthañca sati śleṣaḥ sarvabādhakaḥsan virodhālaṅkāraṃ bādhitvā pratibhāmātreṇāvasthāpayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2616: yatra tu nāṭakādau bhāvyarthopakṣepātmakaṃ bījanyāsalakṣaṇaṃ sūcakatvaṃ tatra mīmāṃsārthamāha-yatra tvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2628: śleṣadhvanivyatirekiṇī gatirapi nāsti, tatra kiṃ kartavyamityākṣepaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2630: śleṣastu dvayorvācyatvābhāvāt sarvathā na pravartata iti dhvaneḥ eva viṣayo 'yam /
GK16ruyalscu:2632: śabdaśaktimūle hi dhvanau vācyapratīyamānayoḥ sambandhābhāvāt sambandhāyaupamyaklṝtpiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2634: sambandhaḥ aupamyānapekṣayā prakārāntareṇa yadi sūpapādaḥ tarhi upamādhvanau ko 'bhiniveśaḥ?
GK16ruyalscu:2635: na kārya eva, yato vastudhvanirapi tatra viṣaye sambagandhāntareṇopapannaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2636: ata eva dhvanikṛtā śabdaśaktimūlo dhvaniḥ alaṅkārarūpo vasturūpaśceti dvidhā nyāyata uktaḥ- alaṅkāro 'tha vastveva śabdādyatrāvabhāsate /
GK16ruyalscu:2639: itthaṃ ca sati prakṛte 'pi sūcakatvasambandhāt śabdaśaktimūlo vastudhvaniravaseyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2642: kauśaikadik ulūkadiśā harṣātmikā te hi prabhāte harṣeṇa kūjanti /
GK16ruyalscu:2643: yadvā kauśika indraḥ , tasya dik prācī tadvijṛmbhaṇavaśāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2645: ākāśaṃ rāṣṭrasamaṃ icchyā tyaktvā valkalasadṛśadhūsarakāntidharaścandraḥ astaśailaṃ yau /
GK16ruyalscu:2646: atha tatkāntāpi niśā samullāsibhiralikulaiḥ krandhantaṃ sutamiva kumudākaraṃ sāntvayantī tena saha kṣipraṃ pratasthe /
GK16ruyalscu:2647: sūcanīye tvarthe viśvāmitrakrodhavaśāt icchyā rāṣṭraṃ tyaktvā vārāṇasīṃ prasthitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2648: tatkāntāpyauśīnarī krandantaṃ rohitāśvaṃ sutaṃ santvayantī tenaiva saha prasthiteti /
GK16ruyalscu:2650: nanu dhūsarakāntivalakaleti sutamiveti ca aupamyasambandhasadbhāvāt kathamayaṃ vastudhvanirityata āha-valkalasūtābhyāṃ tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:2653: ataḥ prakṛtena saha sūcanīyasya sūcanasambandhācca śabdaśaktimūlo vastudhvanireva /
GK16ruyalscu:2655: atha yatra na tulyayogitā nāpi dīpakaṃ tatrāpi nāstyalaṅkārāntaravivikto 'sya viṣaya iti darśayituṃ āha-iheti /
GK16ruyalscu:2656: atra viśeṣaṇānāṃ alakākarṣavaktrāsañjanādīnāṃ vallabhaparatayā prathamaṃ pratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2657: atha itthaṃ vadantyāste lajjā pralīneti sakhīvyavahāke nahi nahīti vallabhasya nihnāvapuraḥsaraṃ kūrpāsakavalyapadeśaḥ kriyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2658: atra hi na tulyayogitā dīpakaṃ vā ato vivikto 'yaṃ śleṣaviṣaya iti na śaṅkanīyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2661: apahnavo hi vastutaḥsādṛśyārthaṃ pravarttate iha tu sādṛśyaṃ apahnavāya pravṛttimiti nāyamapahnava iti codyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2674: itthaṃ nyāyanirbhagharatayā anena prapañcito 'pi kāvyaprakāśakṛtā pratipadaṃ khaṇḍito 'yaṃ śleṣo 'laṃṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2676: saṃpradāyaprakāśinyāṃ tu kāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ vitatya darśitā iti tat evāvadhāryāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2679: aprastutāt sā mānyaviśeṣabhāve kāryakāraṇabhāve sārūpye ca prastutapratītā vaprastutapraśaṃsā // RuAss_34 //
GK16ruyalscu:2685: tatra sāmānyādviśeṣasya viśeṣādvā sāmānyaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sārūpyaṃ ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:2686: tatra sāmānyadviśesaṣasya viśeṣādvā sāmānyasya pratītiriti dvaividhyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2688: sārūpye tu yadyapi naivam, ataḥ pañcaprakāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2690: athasarvaiveyaṃ vācyasya saṃbhavena ubhayarūpatayā ceti tridhā /
GK16ruyalscu:2691: śliṣṭaśabdaprayoge tu śleṣeṇa na bādhyate prastutasyāvācyatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2701: kiṃ tat? kamalinīpatre pāthasaḥ kaṇaṃ muktāmaṇirityāmaṃsteti yat /
GK16ruyalscu:2703: sa evātijaḍaḥ yastu muktāmaṇidhiyā'dīyamāne tatra pāthaḥkaṇe aṅgulyagrakriyāpravilayini satimama maṇiruḍaḍīya gata iti antaḥśucā na nidrāti /
GK16ruyalscu:2706: kimiyaṃ prapadyata iti paśyāma iti dhiyā saṃlāpaparihārādirūpaṃ sthairyaṃ mayālambitam /
GK16ruyalscu:2707: tayā tu “ayaṃ khalu śaṭhaḥ māṃ na kimapyālapatīti“kopa āśritaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2708: ityanyonyavailakṣaṇyena darśanacature tasminnavasthāntare mayā vyājena hasitaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:2721: yena lambālaka iti-atra lambālakatvādinā kāryeṇa gajāsuravadharūpakāraṇapratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2725: dvayorapi prastutatve kāraṇāpekṣayā kāryopavarṇanasya sacamatkāratve taddvārā kāraṇapratyāyanaṃ paryāyoktaviṣayaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2730: itthaṃ ca sati prakṛtasyaca sataur'thasya svopaskārāya prakṛtānatarāgūraṇe paryāyoktameveci prathanāya punarāha-tataśca anayetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2736: atra rājaśukavṛttasyāpi nāyakapratāpāṅgatayā prakṛtatvāt paryāyoktameva boddhavyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2739: idṛśi viṣaye anyeṣāmaprastutapraśaṃsāsātve buddhāvapi na virodhaḥ kaścit /
GK16ruyalscu:2741: kāryasyāprastutatve tu aprastutapraśaṃseti vibhāgasyānā kūlatvāt ityabhiprāyeṇāha-sarvatheti /
GK16ruyalscu:2742: atha etāni sādharmyodāharaṇatvena vijñeyānītyāha-etāni sādharmya iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2744: sārūpyahetukaṃ tu bhedam anayā nītyā sādharmyeṇa sujñānatvātāṃ vaidharmyaṇodāharati-dhanyā iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2754: pramukha eva śākoṭakavṛttasya āropitatva pratīteryujyata evāsambhavaḥ vācyasya jahatsvārthalakṣaṇāmūlatvena atyantatiraskārāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2760: śleṣagarbhatve caitadeva draṣṭavyam chridrakaṇṭakaguṇānāṃ śliṣṭatvādityāha-etadeva ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:2762: arthāntaranyāse hi sāmānyaviśeṣyayoḥ kāryakāraṇayośca vācyatvaṃ(dṛṣṭānte tu)sarūpayoḥ vācyatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:2774: ābhyāṃ sambandhābhyāṃ samarthyatvena nirdiṣṭasya prakṛtasya samarthanamarthāntaranyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2786: atra guṇasannipāte doṣanimajjanalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyaṃ sādharmyeṇa viśeṣasamarthakam /
GK16ruyalscu:2788: puṃsāṃ lokottaraṃ caritameva pratiṣṭhām arpayati audāryaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2794: sahaseti-kriyā dhyavasāyaḥ sahasāvidhānarūpo hyāvivekaḥ āpadāṃ padam anenāpatpadatvarūpaṃ kāryaṃ sahasā vidhānābhāvarūpasya kāraṇasya vaidharmyeṇa samarthakam /
GK16ruyalscu:2796: sahasāvidhānābhāvātmano vimṛśyakāritvasya kāraṇasya sampadvaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ sādharmyeṇa /
GK16ruyalscu:2797: atra sādharmyasya prāthamikatvāt uttarārdhārthapuraskāreṇa yojayati-atra sahasāvidhānetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2800: pṛthvīti-dvitayaṃ pṛthvī bhujaṅgarūpaṃ tat tritaye kūrmarāja yuktadvitayātmani /
GK16ruyalscu:2804: aho hīti-āyuṣā bahvaparāddhaṃ hi suhyadaḥ parābhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā ridṛśamapriyaṃ vaktavyatvenāpatitaṃ yataḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2805: ta evara hidhanyā, suhṛtparābhavamaṭṭaṣṭvā ye kṣayaṃ gatāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2812: samarthyatve na nirdiṣṭaḥ prakṛto yaḥ samarthyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2834: stutyā nindāyā gamyatve ekā nindayā stutestvanyā /
GK16ruyalscu:2835: ato vyājarūpāstutiḥ vyājena stutiriti ca vigrahaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2838: anugamena arthānvayena dvitīyā tu nindāvyājena stutiriti āha-yatrāpīti /
GK16ruyalscu:2840: nanu stutinindayorgamyāṃśasya prastutatvāda prastutapraśaṃsātaḥ ko bheda ityata āha-stutinindeti /
GK16ruyalscu:2843: sa hi kadācideva parasya hitamādhāt tvaṃ tu ye yāvantastṛṣyanti,
GK16ruyalscu:2844: tebhyaḥsarvebhya eva vaimukhyalabdhānāmayaśobhārāṇaṃ prodvahane maroḥsāhāyarkaṃ karoṣi /
GK16ruyalscu:2848: urvīvalayatilaka indulakṣmādiṣu śyāmaleṣu satsu tvadyaśobhirnakiñciddhavalitaṃ iti stutirgamyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2851: yatra tu gamyāṃśasya nyagbhāvastatra nāsyāḥsāmañjasyamiti darśayitumāha-kiṃ vṛttāntairiti /
GK16ruyalscu:2852: atra vallabhā bhramati hantetyuktyā nindāyāḥsutiparyavasāyitvaṃ na sphuṭībhāvati,
GK16ruyalscu:2861: uktavakṣyamāṇayoḥ prākaraṇikayoḥ viśeṣapratītyarthaṃ niṣedhābhāsa ākṣepaḥ // RuAss_38 //
GK16ruyalscu:2862: uktasya vakṣyamāṇasya vā prākaraṇikasya viśeṣapratītyarthaṃ ābhāsato niṣedhanam ākṣepaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2866: ata eva vidheyasya sa kṛtaḥ aviṣaye pravartita ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2871: gajo hi snāta eva san sadyo dhūlidhūsaro bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:2874: tatra kasya kaḥ prakāra ityata āha-uktaviṣayatvenetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2890: bālaka! nāhaṃ dūti tasyāḥ priyo 'sīti nāsmākaṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2893: yati prasīdeti brūyāmasati kopa idaṃ vaco na ghaṭate /
GK16ruyalscu:2894: evaṃ na punaḥ kariṣyāmīti cedbrūyāṃ tathā vidyamānasyābhyupagamaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:2895: na me doṣo 'stīti cedbrūyāṃ tvaṃ punaridaṃ doṣābhāvavaco mṛṣetijñāsyāsi /
GK16ruyalscu:2896: ataḥ kiṃ vaktuṃ kṣamamiti na vedmi /
GK16ruyalscu:2901: athavā vyatikrāma kiṃ bhaṇama iti tu tasyaiva pratyāsannataratvādbhaṇatyanarhatā /
GK16ruyalscu:2903: atra virahavedanāvaśāt jyotsnāpikavacaḥ prabhṛtīnāṃ tamaḥkrakacādirūpāpattyā yato durantatā /
GK16ruyalscu:2914: udīryamāṇasya idaṃ na ghaṭata iti niṣedhamukhenaiva /
GK16ruyalscu:2916: kiṃ bhaṇāma iti sāmānyadvāreṇa vaktumiṣṭasya jīvitasaṃśayādeḥ svarūpata eva bhaṇitiniṣedha ityarthavaśādāgūraṇam ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2917: sā nūnamityaṃ śoktau jīvituṃ na śaknomītyaṃśāntarasya svarūpato bhaṇitiniṣedhādāgūraṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:2922: nanu niṣedhākṣepaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-vidhinā tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:2925: yata itthaṃ niṣedhena vidherākṣepaḥ atar idṛśi viṣaye nālaṅkāntaramityata āha-tataśceti /
GK16ruyalscu:2930: atra hyaparityājyatādi bālyāderna niṣedhakamapi tu tasya sādhakameveti nākṣepabuddhiḥ kāryā /
GK16ruyalscu:2933: tasmāt kāraṇāt saukaryeṇa viśeṣasiddhyarthaṃ tasya niṣedhābhāsa ākṣepokteḥ nimittaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:2935: ato yatra niṣedho vāstavo na tatrākṣepa iti sodāharaṇaṃ darśayati-iha tvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2936: atra pūrva śloke daityā iva kāvyārthacorā luṇṭanāya yatpraguṇībhavanti,
GK16ruyalscu:2938: uttaraśloke tu sarve yathecchaṃ gṛhṇantu loke 'pi na kṣatiriti,
GK16ruyalscu:2940: tathā vāyoḥ kārāgṛhakḷptyai kandarāsu śilākavāṭadānaṃ vihitaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:2941: uttaraśloke evaṃ cintārūpaṃ dainyaṃ mṛṣā kirātā marutāsaha nirodhanavairaṃ necchrandīti kavāṭadānaṃ sākṣānniṣedhyata iti naitadyugalakayugamākṣepodāharaṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:2945: gaṇikā dhanaparāyaṇāḥ satyaḥ sarvam asāmpratamācaranti yataḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2946: atastvayā viśvāso na kārya iti gaṇikāyā evoktau viśvāsaniṣedha ābhāsāyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2959: anvayavyatikekāvasthāyino vastuno nyāyyo 'pi anvayavyatirekāvasthāyitayā samāna iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2962: prākaraṇikasya viśeṣapratītyarthamiti anuvartate, na tu prākaraṇikayoriti, vakṣyamāṇaikaviṣayatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2970: yato vidhirayaṃ ābhāsamāno niṣedhe vyajyamāna upakaraṇam ato vidhyābhāsena vyañjakenāyaṃ nirūpyamāṇo niṣedha ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2971: sa cāniṣṭaviśeṣe paryavasyan ākṣepālaṅkāra iti yojanā /
GK16ruyalscu:2979: gacchasi cedityanena, jigamiṣāsti cet nāhaṃ nirākaromi iti gamyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2980: gacchretyatra tu tena puraskṛto vidhirmamāpi tatraiva gatirbhūyāditi tu prāṇanairāśyāviṣkārān niṣedhapratyāyanam /
GK16ruyalscu:2989: gacchasicedityukto hi kiṃ tatra gamanena mama saṃvijñānetyādi pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2996: haṃso hi śithilāṃsaḥsan saviśeṣaṃ ramyo bhavati, antardhavalimā viṣkārāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2999: anabhipretasyaiva sato gamanasya no kiñciktathanīyamastīti pramukha evābhyupagamaḥ pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3000: itthaṃ ca sati vidhirayaṃ aniṣṭatvenābhāsamāno niṣedhāgūraṇātmana ākṣepasyāṅgam /
GK16ruyalscu:3001: smartavyā ityanena bhūyastarānniṣedha evopodvilitaḥ tathāvidha vīcismṛtau gamanavārtāyā apyayogāt /
GK16ruyalscu:3021: atra janmani punaritthām anubhūtamanastvamiha na prākkoṭyapekṣaṃ pūrvamityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3022: vivekasya viśeṣato dhvaṃsādupacitena mohāndhakāreṇa duruttaraḥ ko 'pi virahavikāro antarjaḍayati tāpayati ca /
GK16ruyalscu:3027: ka evaṃ jānīte? na kasyacididaṃ saṃbhāvyam ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3032: ataḥ śleṣagarbhatve śleṣo bādhakaḥ udbhaṭamatāvalambinām anyeṣāṃ tu saṅkaraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3050: kāryaṃ hi kāraṇamantareṇa na saṃbhavatīti tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt tadabhāve 'pi yadi kāryasaṃbhavaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:3052: yadi kenaciduktivaicitryeṇa kāraṇābhāve 'pi kāryasaṃbhava upanibaddhaḥ tadā vaiśiṣṭyena kāryabhāvanā dvibhāvanā /
GK16ruyalscu:3060: etadvavyatirekarūpayā nītyā vakṣyamāṇasya viśeṣoktyalaṅkārasyāpi virodhato bheda ityāha-evaṃ viśeṣoktavityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3067: kriyāphalameva kāryamiti na hi sarveṣāmabhyupagamaḥ, kintu vaiyākaraṇānāmeva /
GK16ruyalscu:3068: ataḥ kriyā vyatirekiṇo 'pi kāraṇāsya saṃbhavāt sāmānyataḥ kāraṇagrahaṇameva kṛtam /
GK16ruyalscu:3071: sā cātiśayoktirvibhāvanāṃ na vyabhicaratīti na bādhyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3086: anye tu saṃbharaṇāpuṣpayormaṇḍanāstre pratyāsavamadanyāyena sākṣādakarāṇatvādvāṅmātraṃ vibhāvanātvavacanam /
GK16ruyalscu:3089: apare tu vayasi maṇḍanatvādyāropāt rūpakameva yattva saṃbharaṇādi vaiśiṣṭyaṃ tadatraiva adhiropitamityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3093: rūpakatve hi vayaso maṇḍanaṃ rūpopagrāhitāyā maṇḍanamevedamityādi prasajet /
GK16ruyalscu:3105: tadeva cetyāryaṃ na janayeta(t)tadā kimeṣāṃ samagratvam /
GK16ruyalscu:3106: ataḥ kāraṇāni cet samagrāṇi tadā niyamena kāryotpattiriti sthitam /
GK16ruyalscu:3111: itthaṃ ca sati viśeṣamabhivyaṅgaktum uktiriti viśeṣoktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3125: tatra hetuḥ anuktaścintitumaśakyaḥ triṣvapi yojayati-atra satyapi dāheti /
GK16ruyalscu:3126: svarūpeṇa śaktimāniti svaśabdena viruddhena dharmeṇa kvacidiyaṃ vibhāvanayā saṅkīryata iti darśayitumāha-kāryānupattirityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3129: yo me prathamaparibhogena kaumāraṃ hṛtavān adyāpi sa eva varaḥ vasantakṣapāḥ api tā eva /
GK16ruyalscu:3132: ahamapi sā caivāsmi, purātanī premadārā na kuṇṭhitetyarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3133: athāpi revānadīkūle tatra vetasītarutale suratavyāpāralīlāvidhau cetaḥsamuktaṇṭhate /
GK16ruyalscu:3144: atra ślokaḥ- kāryāṃśasya yadā bhāvābhāvau vaktumapekṣitau /
GK16ruyalscu:3157: rājasuvismereṣu paśyatsu tava khaṅge yugapatkīrtyā nirgamena śriyā praveśena cendrajālaṃ kṛtam /
GK16ruyalscu:3176: prāyeṇa bhūpāḥ svato svato hitaparāṅmukhā viṣayākrāntā bhavanti /
GK16ruyalscu:3179: yadvā bāhyo mantrānadhikṛtaḥsevakajano vara mantriṇastu dhik /
GK16ruyalscu:3191: kāraṇavirūpa kāryotpattirekaṃ, anarthotpattiranyat ananurūpayoḥ saṃghaṭanā tṛtīyamiti tridhā /
GK16ruyalscu:3200: vārāṇāsi!tvayi tu tyaktatanūnāṃ divyatanulābhastāvadāstāṃ mūlaṃ prācīnā tanurapyapunarlābhāya yāti /
GK16ruyalscu:3220: tvamevāñcidhasaundaryā sa ca ruciratāyāḥ paricitaḥ yuvāṃ kalābhijñau ca /
GK16ruyalscu:3264: yāvatā śūnyamiti nāmno 'pi nāsti gatiḥ kācit /
GK16ruyalscu:3277: na sva rūpāpekṣayā parasparajananasyāsaṃbhavena samyagvirodhitvāt kriyādvārakameveha parasparajananam /
GK16ruyalscu:3279: tanutvaramyatve devīkaṇṭhasya ātmotkṛṣṭatve sāmagrīmuktākalāpasya ca vṛttatvāt nistalatvamānocanīyatve /
GK16ruyalscu:3292: yeṣām iti ṣaṣṭhīnideśe 'pi na gīrbhiḥsaha sambandhamātram,
GK16ruyalscu:3299: ekena yadyathā sādhitaṃ tasya tathaivānyathīkaraṇaṃ vyāghātaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3302: dṛśā dagdhasya dṛśaiva jīvanāñcārulocanā virūpākṣasya janyinyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3315: kāryāpekṣayā sukarasya viruddhasya karaṇaṃ kāryavyāhatiheturiti vyāghātāntaram /
GK16ruyalscu:3320: itthaṃ ca sati anarthotpattilakṣaṇādviṣāmāt bheda ityāha-na tvatreti /
GK16ruyalscu:3321: na hyatra kāryamakāryaṃ kintu tadviruddhaṃ sukaraṃ kāryam /
GK16ruyalscu:3326: atra bālyaṃ rakṣyatvaṃ cāprasthāne hetutvena sambhāvitaṃ pratyuta saukaryeṇa prasthānaṃ sādhayati /
GK16ruyalscu:3334: kāryaṃ kāraṇamālāyāṃ prācaḥ prācaḥ paraṃ param //
GK16ruyalscu:3336: yathāpūrvaṃ parasya viśeṣaṇātayā sthāpanāpohane ekāvalī // RuAss_54 //
GK16ruyalscu:3337: yadi pūrva pūrvasya paraṃ paraṃ viśeṣaṇatayā sthāpyate, saikā ekāvalī yañcāpohyate sānyā /
GK16ruyalscu:3339: atra parāṇāṃ varāṅganāstāsāṃ rūpaṃ tasya vilāsaḥ sa kusumāyudhasya viśeṣaṇatayā sthāpyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3342: atra jalādeḥ pūrvaṃ pūrvasya paṅkajādyuttarottaraṃ viśeṣaṇamapohyatayā sthitam /
GK16ruyalscu:3351: atra kodaṇḍādeḥ pūrvapūrvasya śarādyuttarottarasamāsādanaṃ dīpanena guṇāvahatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:3378: arthāntaranyāse hi arthātprakṛta samarthanam, iha tu śabdata iti vibhāgaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3382: gamanānukārigatīnāṃ haṃsānāṃ palāyanaṃ ceti vākyārthatrayamekavākyatāpannāyāṃ sādṛśyavinodākṣāntau hetuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3403: jaladadhūmasya vyomasthaganaṃ khadyotānāṃ sphuliṅgāyamānatā, kakubhāṃ vidyujjvālāpiṅgatā ca /
GK16ruyalscu:3420: pratītaḥsamarthyate cet samarthyasamarthakabhāvaḥ tadā padārthasya tvatalādiśiraskatayā hetutvenopādāne na kaścidalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3423: yadā tvatalādyasaṃsparśenopāttasya padārthasya hetutvaṃ tadā “mṛgaśca darbhāṅkure“tyādau padārthanimandhanamekaṃ kāvyaliṅgam /
GK16ruyalscu:3426: yadā tāṭasthyenopāttasya vākyasya arthaparyālocanayā hetutvaṃ tadārtāntaranyāsaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3427: itthaṃ ca sati vākyārthanibandhanaṃ kāvyaliṅgaṃ kāryakāraṇa eva bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:3431: yatpunaḥ kāryakāraṇagatatvenārthāntarasya samarthakatvaṃ tadukta lakṣaṇaṃ kāvyaliṅgamapyanapekṣyaiva /
GK16ruyalscu:3433: itthaṃ ca sati uktalakṣaṇāśrayaṇe, “yattvannetre“tyādau arthāntaranyāsaviviktaṃ kāvyaliṅgameva /
GK16ruyalscu:3434: kāryakāraṇayostu samarthakatvaṃ arthānataranyāse darśitacaramiti gatiriyatī viṣayavibhāgā yāśrayitavyā /
GK16ruyalscu:3459: samudāyasya samudāyena sambandhe śābde paryālocanayā avayavatramasambandha ityārthatā /
GK16ruyalscu:3461: lāvaṇyaprabhā tyāgāvanībharakṣaṇatvaśālini tvayi sati indupūṣacintāratnakulakṣmābhṛtāṃ nairarthakyaṃ /
GK16ruyalscu:3466: yathāsaṃkhyaṃ tathā śābdam ārthaṃ ceti dvidhā matam” //
GK16ruyalscu:3468: eka manekasminanekamekasmin vā krameṇa paryāyaḥ // RuAss_60 //
GK16ruyalscu:3474: evaṃ tarhi viśeṣālaṅkāre yaugapadyagrahaṇaṃ kiṃ na kṛtamityata āha-iha ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:3475: iha amapratipādanāttatra yaugapadyaṃ lakṣaṇatvena arthāt siddhyati ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3478: vakṣyamāṇe samuccaye yaugapadyaṃ lakṣaṇatvena gṛhīṣyata ityāha-ata eva guṇeti /
GK16ruyalscu:3482: iha yo 'yamanekārthaḥ sa pṛthavṛttiḥ saṅghatātmā ca /
GK16ruyalscu:3485: re kālakūṭa! tavāśrayeṣuvṛttiḥ uttarottaraviśiṣṭapadanyāsā kenopadiṣṭā yataḥ prāk hṛdaye,
GK16ruyalscu:3490: atrādhara[kandu]kau karādhārau nivṛttikriyāṃ prati apādānatvena saṃhatau /
GK16ruyalscu:3496: vargatvāvasthā iti saṅghāta vṛtticatuṣṭaye 'pi yojayati-atra kālakūṭamityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3505: samasya samena saha vinimayaḥ ekā parivṛttiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3510: uro datveti-hiraṇyākṣavadhādyeṣu yuddheṣu uro datvā daityānāṃ yaśo gṛhītam /
GK16ruyalscu:3524: anekatra prātpavata ekasyaikatra niyamanaṃ parisaṅkhyā ekakaratra varjanena anyataratra saṅkhyānāt /
GK16ruyalscu:3530: praśrapūrvikā śābdī tathaivārthī apraśrapūrvikā śābdī tathaivārthī[ti]caturdhā /
GK16ruyalscu:3550: atra śleṣaḥ pūrvam siddha iti na bādhakaḥ api tu cārutāvaha ityāha-śleṣasampṛktatvamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:3552: pākṣikatvaniyama anekatra yugapatprātpau parisaṅghyeti hi vākyavitprasiddhaṃ lakṣaṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:3554: itthamataḥ pākṣikaprātpirūpaṃ niyamalakṣaṇamapi svīkriyata iti yugapatsaṃbhāvanātmakaṃ parisaṅkhyālakṣaṇāmiha[prāyikam] /
GK16ruyalscu:3563: “dvandvamanojñe“ti vuñ siddhau pṛṣodarāditvena vṛddhyabhāve 'hamahamikādinayena daṇḍāpūpiketi kecit /
GK16ruyalscu:3566: apare punaḥ “ive pratikṛtā“viti kana upamārthatvena varṇāyanti /
GK16ruyalscu:3578: sthirā apiprahvī bhavanti, loleṣu kā kathā? atra prākaraṇikārthāpātaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3581: śaṅkākaraṃ kimayaṃ sevya uta neti śaṅkājanakam /
GK16ruyalscu:3597: tatra śirāṃsi dhanīṣi ca sandhivigrahapramāṇatayā tulyabalāni viruddhatvādyugapatprāptyayoge 'pi prāpnuvanti /
GK16ruyalscu:3636: rasa iha śṛṅgāraḥṣad dagvikārāṇāmeṣāṃ tadekaniṣṭhatvāt kathaṃ bhinnakriyaṃ nyañcitamityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3674: ekasya siddhihetau anyasya tatkaratvaṃ ca // RuAss_66 //
GK16ruyalscu:3675: ekasmin kasyacit siddhihetau spardhayā anyasyāpi tatkaratvaṃ samuccayaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3681: yathā khale kapottāḥ spardhayā pratisvaṃ ahamahamikayāvataranti /
GK16ruyalscu:3682: tathā bhāve samuccayaḥ iti mahān bhedaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3683: khale kapotā asyāṃ santi nītāviti khalekapotikā /
GK16ruyalscu:3688: evaṃ devadattasya āgamanaṃ dasyīnāñcacopanipātastaiśca tasya vadhaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3689: tatra devadattatasyusamāgamaḥ kākatālasamāgama iveti eka upamārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3699: yairjano darpaṃ vrajati, ta eva tavāṅkuśāḥ unmārganivārakāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3705: navavayaḥ prabhṛteḥ kathamaśobhanatvam ityata āha-navavaya ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3706: śaśīti-śaśyādi viśeṣyaṃ śobhanaṃ dhūsaratvādi viśeṣaṇavaśādaśobhanamiti viśiṣṭasya dvairūpyam /
GK16ruyalscu:3709: anyathā tu na yojanīyamityata āha-na tvatreti /
GK16ruyalscu:3727: durvāretyatratvitthaṃ “śaṭhaḥ kathaṃ soḍhavya” iti sarvathā kaṣṭatvamevopasaṃhṛtam /
GK16ruyalscu:3771: ayi ehi tāvatsundari karṇāṃ dattvā śṛṇu vacanīyam /
GK16ruyalscu:3772: tatava mukhena kṛśodari candra upamīyate janena //
GK16ruyalscu:3773: candrasyopamānatvaṃ vacanīyamiti kathanāt candrasya nikṛṣṭatvenopameyatvena kalpanam /

GK16ruyalscu:4361: tathā lakalolakalo iti kalolakalola iti ca sajātīyayamakayorapi /
GK16ruyalscu:4373: pāda evāmbujamiti rūpakapakṣesa pratikūlaḥ ambakūlaḥ ambuje tadayogāt /
GK16ruyalscu:4390: evaṃ ca sati aṅgulībhiriveti yā vākyenoktā yā ca sarojalocanam iti samāsena tābhyāmupamābhyāṃ śleṣeṇa cānugṛhītā mukham iti atiśayo(ktiḥ)
GK16ruyalscu:4392: teṣāṃ balena samutthānādutthitā cotthāpakānāṃ camatkānāṃ camatkārakatvahetuḥ ityaṅgāṅgitā /
GK16ruyalscu:4397: atra vāruṇīti śleṣaḥ trayīmayo 'pyagamaditi virodhapratibhotthāpakaḥ tadvādhakaśca /
GK16ruyalscu:4403: tatra virodhaśleṣā vanupraviṣṭau yacca kāraṇotprekṣānimittaṃ pātādikāryaṃ tatra vāstavau pātāgripraveśāvupahatihetukapātāgripraveśābhyāmabhedena adhyavasitau /
GK16ruyalscu:4405: nanu virodhaśleṣayoratiśayoktyutprekṣayośca kuto nāṅgāṅgibhāva ittyāha-na ca virodhetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4406: yadyapi śleṣo viridhapratibhotpattihetuḥ yadyapi cātiśayoktiḥ utprekṣānimittaṃ tathāpi nānayoḥ śleṣābhyāṃ sahāṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4412: śleṣasya tu viviktau'styevetyata āha-na ca mantavyamityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4414: ataḥ śleṣeṇa anyabādha iti tamnadhyānupraviṣṭo virodho 'pi bādhya eva /
GK16ruyalscu:4433: yathā hi śabdayormitho nopakāraḥ tathā śabdālaṅkārayorapi /
GK16ruyalscu:4434: kastarhir idṛśi viṣaye prakāra ityata āha-śabdālaṅkāreti /
GK16ruyalscu:4438: ataḥ śabdālaṅkāraparihāreṇa aṅgāṅgibhāva iti nirṇāyati-evameṣa iti /
GK16ruyalscu:4454: mukhameva candra iti rūpakasamāsaśca sādhakabādhaka pramāṇavirahādanayoḥsandehaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4458: binduḥ śuddhādhvopādānamahāmāyā nādo 'nāhataḥ tau prasaratoyasmāt sisṛkṣostasmai /
GK16ruyalscu:4464: anantaḥ śeṣo mathanādau śeṣībhūtaḥ , tena prakāśaḥ prathitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4465: iha śaṅkara eva kṣīrasindhuriti rūpake sādhakam /
GK16ruyalscu:4467: amṛtaśabdo hi sudhāyāṃ pracuraprasiddhikaḥ kṣīrasindhāvanukūlatarara iti rūpakasamāsa evāyam /
GK16ruyalscu:4475: avantīścararūpāt pārijātāt jātāni yaśorūpāṇi prasūnāni digrūpāṇāṃ vadhūnāmavataṃsayāmi, paśyata /
GK16ruyalscu:4483: nanu śaradīveti samabhivyāhṛteyam upamā kathaṃ nopamāsādhiketyata āha- natu śaradīveti /
GK16ruyalscu:4484: nyāyato vākyārthībhūtaṃ rūpakamābhāsata ekadeśavirtinyupamā na hi bādhiturm iṣṭe /
GK16ruyalscu:4492: prakāntenaikenaiva nirvahaṇīyamiti naiṣā rājājñā yena dṛṣṭabādha āśaṅkyate /
GK16ruyalscu:4493: yallaṅghanenadṛṣṭabādṛṣṭayordvayorapi bādhaḥsyāt yato nyāyo 'yamityatata āha-nāpyeṣa iti /
GK16ruyalscu:4496: iha tu uttarottaraṃ prakarṣavivakṣeti upamāpekṣayā rūpake sāmyaprakarṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4501: hāraḥ kuṭhārāyata iti tūpamayā prakarṣa nītaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4503: sāmānyaprayoge upamābādhaka iti nyāyopanno rūpakaprakrama eva nirvahīṇīya iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:4507: itthamaṅgāṅgibhāvasandeha rūpaṃ prakāradvayaṃ vivicya tṛtīyaṃ prakāraṃ vivecayati-tṛtīyastviti /
GK16ruyalscu:4515: ekatraiva narakaśabde 'nupraviṣṭau śliṣṭaśabdenobhayopakārāt śabdaśleṣeṇāpyupamā saṅkarārthamāha-atra ca yathetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4523: ataḥ sāmagrīyogāt sampannā dyotitaraṅgaśobhinītyekasminneva śabde sabhaṅgapadatvāt śabdaśleṣeṇa saṃkīrṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:4530: udbhāṭaprakāśitastu prakārāntaragocaraśabdārthālaṅkārasaṃkaraḥ saṃsṛṣṭau antarbhāvita iti tasya saṃkaratvamaṅgāṅgibhāva evoktamityāha-śabdārthālaṅkāretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4551: stutyā nindāyāḥ nindāyā vā stutergamyatve vyājastutiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4577: nanu śabdādyalaṅkāratve ko doṣa ityata āha-tadalaṅkāratvaprayojakatva iti /
GK16ruyalscu:4582: itthaṃ bhūmrā rucakavacasāṃ vistaraḥ karkaśo 'yaṃ ṭīkāsmābhiḥ samuparacitānena sañjīvanīyam //
